Korean: 저희 쪽에 등록되어 있는 연락처 뒤에 네자리 확인 가능하십니까
English: Can you check the last four digits of the contact number registered with us?
The last 4 digits of your number are #@phone number#

Korean: 네 소중한 정보 확인 감사합니다 지금 사용하시는 학습기기 기종이요
English: Yes, thank you for checking the valuable information. What type of learning device are you currently using?
What kind of plane is it, Mom?
This is now #@product#

Korean: 그러세요 전용 충전선 이용하세요 아니면 휴대폰 충전기 이용하고 계세요
English: Yes, please use a dedicated charging cable or use a mobile phone charger.
I'm doing it exclusively

Korean: 그러세요 어머님 혹시 저희가 그 전용 충전 선 옆에 보면요
English: Yes, Mom, if we look next to that dedicated charging line

Korean: 오핀 단자라고 해서 휴대폰 충전 선 연결할 수 있는 단자가 있어요
English: There is a terminal called an opin terminal where you can connect a cell phone charging cable.
Yes, over here on the side

Korean: 네 휴대폰 충전선으로 충전이 되면 이용을 해주셔도 무방하거든요 어머님
English: Yes, you can use it if you charge it with your cell phone charger, Mom.
Yes, with your cell phone charging cord.
Yes, that's fine, thank you
This is #@Affiliation# #@Name# with our customers.

Korean: 네 #@상품#이 고장이 나서요 수리를 맡길까 하고요
English: Yes, #@Product# is broken. I'm thinking of taking it in for repair.

Korean: 네 고객님 해당 상품 에이에스 가능하시구요
English: Yes, sir, you can get AS for that product.

Korean: #@상품# 기종 같은 경우에는 우체국 택배로 발송해 주시면 됩니다
English: #@Product# If it is the same model, you can send it via post office courier.
Yes, you have to send it by post office delivery.

Korean: 예 저희 제조사로 발송하기 전에 학습 기기의 증상을 자세하게요
English: Yes, please describe the symptoms of the learning device in detail before sending it to our manufacturer.

Korean: 메모해 주시고요 연락처와 회원님 성함을 메모해 주시면 됩니다
English: Please take note of it. Just write down your contact information and member name.
Yes, I will send it together like that.

Korean: 네 참고하실 수 있도록 문자로 전송해 드릴 거고요
English: Yes, I will send it to you as a text message for your reference.

Korean: 문자 받을 수 있는 연락처가 #@전번# 맞으세요 어머니
English: Is your contact number #@phone number# where I can receive texts? Mom
Yes, #@phone number# is correct

Korean: 네 해당 번호로 제가 문자를 전송해 드리겠습니다
English: Yes, I will send you a text message to that number.
Yes, I understand. Thank you.

Korean: 고객과 함께 하는 #@소속# #@이름#입니다 제가 무엇을 도와드릴까요
English: I am #@Affiliation# #@Name# working with customers. How can I help you?

Korean: 태블릿 구매 할려고 하는데 궁금한 게 있어서요
English: I'm thinking about buying a tablet, but I have a question.

Korean: 지금 십이개월 수업할 때 쿠폰이 적용된다고 나와있더라고요
English: It says that coupons are applied when taking classes for twelve months now.

Korean: 저희 홈페이지에서 처음으로 기기 구매하시는 고객님들께는요
English: For customers who are purchasing a device for the first time from our website,

Korean: 오천 원 할인 쿠폰 열두 장을 드려요 이제 학습비용 결제도 하실 텐데요
English: I'll give you twelve coupons worth 5,000 won each. Now you can pay for your tuition.

Korean: 두 번째 달부터 시작해서 열 두 번 동안 그 쿠폰을 사용하셔야 해요
English: You must use the coupon twelve times starting from the second month.

Korean: 그래야 할인 적용 되실 수가 있습니다
English: Then you can apply the discount

Korean: 그거는 그냥 다 해당 되는 거죠
English: That just applies to everything

Korean: 예 처음으로 #@상품# 가입해서 기기 구매 하시면요
English: Yes, if you sign up for #@Product# for the first time and purchase a device,

Korean: 근데 가입 계정에 상관없이 첫 구매일 때만 그런 거죠
English: But this only happens when it's your first purchase, regardless of the account you signed up for.

Korean: 지금 수업은 진행되고 있어도 상관이 없는 거죠
English: It doesn't matter if the class is in progress now.

Korean: 최소 수업은 진행되고 있지만 기기는 처음 구매를 하시는 거죠
English: The minimum class is in progress, but this is your first time purchasing the device.
Yes this is my first purchase

Korean: 예 그러면 두 번째 달부터 열 두 번까지 제공이 되는 겁니다
English: Yes, then it will be provided twelve times starting from the second month.

Korean: 좀 죄송한데 이거 오늘 신청하면 언제쯤 올까요
English: I'm sorry, but if I apply for this today, when will it arrive?

Korean: 저희가 지금 외국에 장기간 있을 생각이라서요
English: Because we are planning to stay abroad for a long time

Korean: 그러십니까 어머니 근데 두 시 이전에 결제가 완료되어야지요
English: Is that so, mother? But the payment must be completed before two o'clock.

Korean: 당일 출고가 되고 두 시 이후가 되면 내일 출고가 되실 거예요
English: It will be shipped the same day, and if it is after 2 o'clock, it will be shipped the next day.

Korean: 그리고 출고는 물류 센터에서 지역의 택배 사정에 따라서 달라집니다
English: And shipping varies from the logistics center to the local courier situation.

Korean: 하루에서 이틀 정도 소요되실 수 있습니다
English: It may take one to two days.

Korean: 네 그러면은 바로 사용은 가능한 거죠
English: Yes, then you can use it right away.

Korean: 네 세팅만 하시면 바로 사용하실 수 있게 되어 있으세요
English: Yes, you can use it right away after setting it up.
Yes, I understand. Thank you.

Korean: 네 제가 바로 문자 전송해 드리겠습니다
English: Yes, I will send you a text right away.
This is #@Affiliation# #@Name# working with customers. How can I help you?

Korean: 오전에 전화 드렸는데요 단말기를 다른 데로 옮기려고 하는데요
English: I called you this morning and I'm trying to move my device to another location.

Korean: 이게 지금 애가 썼는데 인터넷을 했다 그러더라고요
English: This is what the kid wrote just now, and he said he was on the internet
So he told me to call customer service.

Korean: 지금 일반 기능도 같이 오픈해서 사용을 하고 있던 기기라는 말씀이시죠
English: Are you saying that this is a device that is currently being used with general functions open?
Yes, that's right

Korean: 네 알겠습니다 그러시면은 지금 말씀하신 내용 관련해서요
English: Yes, I understand. Then, regarding what you just said

Korean: 저희가 학습기 상담원에게 전달해서 다시 한 번 연락을 드리겠습니다
English: We will forward this to our learning consultant and get back to you.

Korean: 세 시에서 네 시 사이에 통화 가능하신가요
English: Are you available to talk between 3 and 4 o'clock?

Korean: 제가 바로 전화를 드릴 수는 없나요
English: Can I call you right away?

Korean: 직통번호가 따로 있는 게 아닙니다 그래서 전화주시면 예약 해 드리구요
English: There is no separate direct number, so please call and I will make a reservation for you.

Korean: 해당 학습기 상담원이 다시 한 번 연락을 드리고 있습니다
English: The learning agent is contacting you again.

Korean: 네 되도록이면 빨리 좀 부탁 드려요
English: Yes, please do it as soon as possible.

Korean: 세 시에서 네 시 사이에 연락 드리구요 이 번호로 연락 드리겠습니다
English: I will contact you between 3 and 4 o'clock and I will contact you at this number.
Yes, you can call me here.
Do you have any other questions?
No, there isn't, thank you
This is #@Affiliation# #@Name# with our customers.

Korean: 네 이번에 신청한 기기에 충전 잭이 잘 안 들어가요
English: Yes, the charging jack on the device I applied for this time doesn't work well.

Korean: 그러세요 전용 충전 선이랑 휴대폰 충전기 중에 어떤 걸 사용하세요
English: Yes, which one do you use, a dedicated charging cable or a mobile phone charger?
I use it exclusively

Korean: 혹시 충전 선 옆에 보면 오핀 단자라는 게 있어요
English: If you look next to the charging cable, there is something called an open terminal.
Yes, over here on the side

Korean: 네 휴대폰 충전 선으로 충전되면 이용해 주셔도 무방합니다
English: Yes, you can use it if it is charged with your mobile phone charging cable.

Korean: 혹시 지금 충전 연결해 보실 수 있으십니까
English: Could you please try connecting the charger now?

Korean: 근데 이게 지금 보니까 기존에 충전하는 쪽이 조금 많이 벌어졌어요
English: But now that I look at it, the gap between the existing charging side and the charging side is quite large.
Can I get this repaired?

Korean: 예 저희 에이에스 가능하시고요 어머니 해당 증상이 있으면요
English: Yes, we can do AS if your mother has the symptoms.

Korean: 그 다음으로 에이에스 진행 안내를 해 드립니다
English: Next, I will guide you through the ACE process.

Korean: 네 그럼 수리할 수 있게 해 주세요
English: Okay, then please let me fix it.
This is #@Affiliation# #@Name# working with customers. How can I help you?
Yes, I am currently working on #@product#

Korean: 단말기를 다른 데 쪽으로 좀 옮겨서 다른 단말기로 쓰려 그러거든요
English: I want to move the terminal to another place and use it as a different terminal.
Is the person calling you the mother of member #@name#?
Yes, that's right, the last seat is #@phone number#

Korean: 네 소중한 정보 확인 감사합니다 지금 저희 전용 학습기가 아니구요
English: Yes, thank you for checking the valuable information. It is not our exclusive learning tool right now.

Korean: 범용기 학습 앱을 설치해서 학습을 하고 계시는 건가요
English: Are you studying by installing a universal learning app?

Korean: 아니요 전용 학습기인데 이게 좀 버벅거려서요
English: No, it's a dedicated learning device, but it stutters a bit.
I'm saying this because I want to use it somewhere else

Korean: 지금 그러시면 전용 학습기로 #@상품# 학습을 하고 계시는데요
English: If you do that now, you are studying #@product# with a dedicated learning device.

Korean: 같은 모델 다른 기기로 학습을 하신다는 말씀이신가요
English: Are you saying that you are learning the same model on a different device?

Korean: 네 이걸 깔아야 이리로 다시 옮길 수가 있잖아요
English: Yeah, I have to install this before I can move it back here.

Korean: 근데 네트워크가 안 되는데 어떻게 해야 돼요
English: But the network isn't working. What should I do?

Korean: 새로 구입하신 기기는 이전에 저희 #@소속# 학습을 하셨던 기기인가요
English: Is the device you purchased the same one you used for learning at #@affiliation# before?
I bought it used before

Korean: 일반 기능이 뭐가 사용이 가능한지 그런 부분도 잘 모르시는 거네요
English: You don't even know what general functions are available.

Korean: 네 잘 몰라요 그럼 제가 확인하고 다시 연락 드릴게요
English: Yes, I don't know. Then I will check and get back to you.
This is #@Affiliation# #@Name# with our customers.

Korean: 네 충전하는 잭이 잘 안 들어가서요
English: Yes, the charging jack doesn't go in well.

Korean: 충전하는 단자에 충전 잭이 접촉이 안 된다는 말씀이세요
English: Are you saying that the charging jack is not making contact with the charging terminal?

Korean: 저희 학습자 분 성함이 어떻게 되십니까
English: What is our learner's name?
Your learner is #@name#

Korean: 네 #@이름# 회원님 어머님 되시고요 상담 진행을 위해서요
English: Yes, member #@name#, you are my mother. This is for consultation.

Korean: 저희 쪽에 등록된 연락처 뒤에 네 자리 확인 가능하십니까
English: Can you please confirm the four digits on the back of the contact information registered with us?
The last 4 digits of your number are #@phone number#

Korean: 네 소중한 정보 확인 감사합니다 학습기기 기종이요
English: Yes, thank you for checking the valuable information. It is a learning device model.
What kind of plane is it, Mom?
This is currently being used as a #@product# model

Korean: 고객과 함께 하는 #@소속# #@이름#입니다 제가 무엇을 도와드릴까요
English: I am #@Affiliation# #@Name# working with customers. How can I help you?

Korean: #@상품# 수업을 하고 있는데 이제 태블릿 피씨를 주문하려고 하거든요
English: #@Product# I'm taking a class and I'm thinking about ordering a tablet PC.

Korean: 네 전용 학습기를 주문하려 하신다는 말씀이시죠
English: So you're saying you want to order your own learning device?
Yes, among those learning tools, I'm trying to do #@product#

Korean: 지금 인터넷 상에서는 주문이 안 돼서 전화 드렸거든요
English: I'm calling because I can't order online right now.
You are saying that you can't order online?

Korean: 홈페이지에서 기기 구매를 하실 수가 있는데요
English: You can purchase the device on our website.
Excuse me, but in order to proceed with the consultation accurately,

Korean: 자녀분의 성함 확인을 좀 부탁 드려도 될까요
English: Could you please confirm your child's name?

Korean: 두 명인데 한 명만 불러도 되나요 두 명 다 불러야 하나요
English: There are two people, can I call just one? Should I call both of them?

Korean: 기기 구매하실 회원님의 이름으로 불러주시면 될 것 같습니다
English: I think you can call me by the name of the member who will purchase the device.
Yes, I am #@name#
#@Name# Please wait a moment
Yes, please check.

Korean: 기다려 주셔서 감사합니다 초등학교 삼학년 #@이름# 회원님 맞으세요
English: Thank you for waiting. Are you a third grade elementary school student #@name#?
Yes, that's right #@name#

Korean: 피씨버전 입력하시고 #@번호# 접속 되면 안 되시구요
English: Please enter the PC version and enter #@number# and it will not connect.
You must access the site #@URL#

Korean: 제가 문자 전송을 다시 한 번만 해드릴게요
English: Let me send you the text again just once.

Korean: 네 제가 잘 못 했네요 문자 보내주세요
English: Yes, I did something wrong. Please send me a text.
This is #@Affiliation# #@Name# working with customers. How can I help you?

Korean: 아까 오전에 통화하구요 중복 배분한 거 연락이 안 와서요
English: I called you this morning and I haven't heard back from you about the duplicate distribution.
Yes, I'm sorry for the inconvenience.

Korean: 배분 취소 번호 #@번호# 맞으시죠 선생님 성함이 어떻게 되세요
English: Cancellation number #@number# is correct, what is your name?
Yes, teacher #@name#

Korean: #@이름# 선생님 되시고요 혹시 취소한 교재가 총 몇 권인가요
English: #@Name# Teacher, how many textbooks have you cancelled?

Korean: 네 권인데 제가 하나를 더 넣었거든요
English: There are four volumes, but I added one more

Korean: 다섯 권이라고 표시가 되어 있을 거예요 에이에스 알 네 권입니다
English: It will be marked as five volumes. It is four volumes of AS R.

Korean: 그러면 여기서 제외할 교재가 있다는 말씀이세요
English: So you're saying there are textbooks that should be excluded here?
Yes, that's right

Korean: 그럼 하나만 제외해서 입력 완료 눌러주시겠습니까
English: Then, please click on Complete Input except for one.
Yes, I pressed complete input

Korean: 네 그러면 체크 되어 있는 건 총 네 권이라는 말씀이신 거죠
English: Yes, so you're saying there are a total of four books checked.

Korean: 네 지금 네 권 체크 되어 있습니다
English: Yes, your books are checked now

Korean: 이게 전부 다 중복 배분 맞으시고요
English: All of these are duplicate distributions.
Yes, they are all distributed in duplicate.

Korean: 예 저희가 부서 전달해서 취소를 해야 될 것 같은데요
English: Yes, I think we should forward it to the department and have them cancel it.

Korean: 이따 오후에 다섯 시 좀 넘어서 확인 부탁 드립니다
English: Please check back later, a little after 5pm.
Yes, I will check in the afternoon.
Yes, have a nice day.
This is #@Affiliation# #@Name# with the customer. Is it okay if I call you?
Yes, I can hear you. Go ahead.

Korean: 네 연결 되셨는데요 예 여기서 어떤 학습에서 문제가 있으신가요
English: Yes, you're connected. Yes, what part of the learning are you having trouble with?

Korean: #@기타#인 것 같은데 제가 한 게 아니라 애가 하다가요
English: #@Other# I think it's not me who did it, it's the kid who did it
Yes, #@Other# is orange

Korean: 그때도 이제 다운로딩이 실패 문구가 확인 되네요
English: Even then, I can see the message that downloading has failed.

Korean: 근데 지금 이거 두 개를 해야 되는데 못 한다고 지금 갔거든요
English: But I have to do these two things now, but I went there because I couldn't do it.

Korean: 저희가 십삼 일에 초기화를 해드렸거든요 그런데도 계속 안 되신 건가요
English: We reset it on the thirteenth day, but it still doesn't work?

Korean: 아니 그때 이후로 했어요 했는데 어제부터요 이것만 하면 끝나는데요
English: No, I did it since then, but starting yesterday, if you just do this, it's over.

Korean: 일단은 제가 이 증상은 사실은 초기화를 하게 되면 증상이 사라지세요
English: First of all, this symptom actually disappears when I initialize it.

Korean: 근데 또 이렇게 생기신다고 하면 중간에 무슨 업데이트 하신게 있나요
English: But if you say it looks like this again, did you make any updates in the meantime?

Korean: 날짜 시간 화면 설정 페이지로 이동이 될 거예요
English: You will be taken to the Date Time Screen Settings page.
Yes, this is your settings page.

Korean: 거기서 이제 날짜 먼저 확인을 해 주셔야 되는데요
English: You need to check the date there first.
Is it supposed to be the twenty-first of August, two thousand and eighteen?
Yes, the date is correct.

Korean: 그 시간이 오후 한시 오분 또는 십삼시 오분으로 되어 있을까요
English: Is the time one five or thirteen five in the afternoon?
It is divided into ten categories.

Korean: 그분에 조금 차이가 있는데요 오분으로 변경을 해 주시겠습니까
English: There is a slight difference in his number. Could you change it to five minutes?
Yeah, this is five minutes

Korean: 네 한 시 오 분으로 변경해 주세요
English: Yes, please change it to one o'clock five minutes.

Korean: 네 한 시 오 분 됐어요
English: Yes, it's five minutes past one.

Korean: 네 그럼 이제 닫기 해주시고 다시 #@소속# 실행해 보세요
English: Yes, then close it and run #@affiliation# again.
Is the synchronization progressing?

Korean: 아니요 아직 영어는 #@기타#로 처음이다만 뜨고 있는데요
English: No, I'm still getting the English #@Other#

English: Could you please check once near Wi-Fi to see if synchronization is in progress?
Yes, it's done now.

Korean: 지금 이제 동기화 진행 되시는 거죠
English: Synchronization is in progress now

Korean: 이제 추후에도 시간이 맞지 않을 경우에는요
English: Now, if the timing doesn't work out later on

Korean: 또 서버 시간 맞지 않다라고 확인될 수 있기 때문에요
English: Also, it may be confirmed that the server time is not correct.

Korean: 일단은 현재 시간과 날짜로 변경해 주시고 이용해 주시면 됩니다
English: First, please change it to the current time and date and use it.
Yes, I understand. Thank you.

Korean: 네 감사합니다 다른 문의 사항은 없으십니까
English: Yes, thank you. Do you have any other questions?
Yes, no more

English: Yes, I hope you have a nice day. I am #@name#

English: This is #@Affiliation# #@Name# working with customers. How can I help you?

English: Yes, when ordering this textbook, you need to order it according to your level.

Yes, that's right, teacher.

Korean: 이 조건 작업은 팔월 말까지 지원이 되고 있습니다

Until the end of August, it doesn't matter what level you are at.

English: It's a bit too much. Can I get this repaired?

English: I will give you the instructions for the AS process, and you said #@Product#

English: You can send it to our manufacturer, but when you send it,

English: If payment is made on July 1st, payment will be made again on August 20th.

English: I made the payment, but I want to cancel it and do it again.

Korean: 네 고객님 그렇게 하시면 됩니다만 다른 문제가 있으실까요
English: Yes, sir, you can do that, but are there any other problems?
Oh, when will the cancellation fee arrive?
Are you sure you want to cancel the payment now?

Korean: 그리고 결제수단에 따라 취소금액 입금 시기도 다릅니다 고객님
English: And the cancellation amount deposit time varies depending on the payment method.
The payment was cancelled and I paid via mobile phone.

Korean: 그러면 보통 확인되시면 바로 취소금액 복원되십니다
English: Then, usually, once confirmed, the cancellation amount will be restored immediately.
Oh, is that so? Just a moment. I'll check.
That's right. If you cancel a mobile payment, it will be credited right away.
Yes, that's right. Do you have any other questions?
No, there isn't. Thank you for your hard work.
Yes, have a nice day. This was counselor #@name#.
Good morning #@Affiliation# Customer Center Counselor #@Name#

Korean: #@상품# 사용할때 다른 결제수단이랑 같이 쓸 수 있나요
English: #@Product# Can I use it with other payment methods?
Yes, you can, sir.

Korean: 대신 다른 결제수단은 오로지 신용카드만 선택 가능하세요
English: Instead, the only other payment method you can choose is credit card.
Can I use a bank transfer or bank deposit?

Korean: 네 해당 수단으로는 복합결제 불가능 하십니다
English: Yes, composite payment is not possible with that method.
Oh, then I guess I can't pay with my phone either.
Yes, mobile phone payments are not possible either.
Okay, I guess I'll have to pay with a credit card.

Korean: 네 코로나 조심하시고 건강하세요 지금까지 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다
English: Yes, be careful of Corona and stay healthy. This was counselor #@name#.
Nice to meet you, I am #@Affiliation# Customer Center Counselor #@Name#

Korean: 아이가 쓰는 아이디인 경우에 부모 카드로 결제해도 되나요
English: If the ID is used by a child, can I pay with the parent's card?
Yes, it's okay, sir.

Korean: 자녀분 아이디로 부모님 카드 결제 말씀하시는거 맞으실까요
English: Are you sure you mean paying with your parents' card using your child's ID?
Is it not possible to listen with my ID?

Korean: 가능은 하시지만 자녀분 아이디로 결제해서 들으시는게 제일 좋습니다
English: It is possible, but it is best to pay and listen using your child's ID.

Korean: 아이 이름으로 가입한 아이디로 하는게 좋다는거죠
English: It's better to sign up with an ID that's under your child's name.
Yes, you can pay with your parents' card.
Okay, I don't care if it gets paid, I'll hang up.
Yes, thank you. This was counselor #@name#.
Good morning #@Affiliation# Customer Center Counselor #@Name#

Korean: 이벤트로 교재 당첨 됐는데요 이게 갖고있는건데 어떡해요
English: I won a textbook at an event, but I have it. What should I do with it?
Ah, is this a duplicate of the event textbook?

Korean: 네 이거 이벤트로 받는건 환불하거나 다른걸로 주실 수 있나요
English: Yes, if I receive this as an event, can I get a refund or give it to you as something else?

Korean: 이벤트 교재를 환불하실 수는 없고요 고객님
English: Event materials cannot be refunded, customer.

Korean: 기존 교재 구매 건이 환불 해당되시면 그쪽이 환불은 가능하세요
English: If your existing textbook purchase is eligible for a refund, you can get a refund.

Korean: 꽤 예전에 사서 아마 안될건데요 쓰기도 했고요
English: I bought it quite a while ago and it probably won't work, but I did use it.

Korean: 그러면 환불 해당되는 교재가 없으셔서 불가능하세요
English: Then, it is not possible because there are no textbooks eligible for a refund.
Is it not possible to replace it with another textbook?
Your regulations don't allow that.
Okay, I'll take it first. I'll hang up.

Korean: 네 오늘도 좋은 하루 보내세요 지금까지 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다
English: Yes, have a nice day today. This was counselor #@name#.
Nice to meet you, I am #@Affiliation# Customer Center Counselor #@Name#

Korean: 강의 사고 이벤트 쿠폰 받았는데요 다른걸로 교환 되나요
English: I received a coupon for a lecture event. Can I exchange it for something else?
Coupons cannot be exchanged, customer.
Then you won't exchange it for money?

Korean: 네 해당 쿠폰의 사용처에서만 사용 가능하세요
English: Yes, it can only be used at the place where the coupon is used.

Korean: 근데 이 쿠폰으로 할인받는 강의를 제가 안들을거 같은데요
English: But I don't think I'll take the course that gets a discount with this coupon.
You just need to use it within the validity period.
You can use it later if you change your mind.

Korean: 갖고만 있는 애물단지네요 규정이 그렇다니 일단 알겠습니다
English: It's just a pet that I have. I understand that it's the rule.
Be careful of Corona and stay healthy. I was counselor #@name#.
Hello, this is #@Affiliation# Customer Center Counselor #@Name#

Korean: 주간지 유형들은 환불 규정이 어떻게 돼요
English: What is the refund policy for weekly magazines?
In what situations would you like a refund?
I received a 4-week supply, but only used it for 1 week.
I was wondering if I could get a refund for 3 weeks

Korean: 죄송합니다 고객님 1주차라도 사용을 하셨다면 환불은 불가능하십니다
English: Sorry, customer. If you have used it for even one week, a refund is not possible.
I didn't even touch it, but they won't even give me three weeks' worth
Partial refunds themselves are not possible
Then I guess I'll just have to keep it. Okay.

Korean: 네 오늘도 좋은 하루 되세요 저는 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다
English: Yes, have a nice day today. I am counselor #@name#
Start your day refreshed #@Affiliation# Customer Center Counselor #@Name#
I would like to get a refund for my weekly magazine product.

Korean: 네 고객님 혹시 수강을 하신 상태이실까요
English: Yes, sir, have you taken the class?
No, I just received it and didn't open it.
I received it last Friday, so I can get a refund.
Yes, sir, it is possible within 10 days.
Yes, where should I return it?

Korean: 홈페이지 온라인문의 1:1 질문하기 이용하셔서 환불 접수 해주시면 됩니다
English: You can apply for a refund by using the 1:1 inquiry on the website.
What about things like return shipping?
Since it is a refund due to a simple change of mind, the member is responsible for the cost.
Okay, I understand. Then I will contact you through the website.
Yes thank you I was counselor #@name#
Good morning #@Affiliation# Customer Center Counselor #@Name#

Korean: 환불 접수는 했는데 진행 내역을 알 수 있을까요
English: I applied for a refund, but can I check the progress?

Korean: 네 고객님 결제 수단은 어떤걸 사용하셨을까요
English: Dear customer, what payment method did you use?
I paid with a credit card

Korean: 결제 승인취소시 취소일로부터 약 4일 후에 확인 가능하세요
English: If you cancel payment approval, you can check it approximately 4 days after the cancellation date.
Doesn't money usually come in like this right away?
Yes, I understand that you will refund the money to the credit card company next month.

Korean: 아 돈이 나가기 전에 빨리 했었어야 했네요
English: Oh, I should have done it quickly before the money ran out.

Korean: 네 그러시면 승인 취소되어서 결제대금이 청구되지 않으셨을거예요
English: Yes, if you do that, the approval will be canceled and you will not be charged.
Okay, I'll wait for now.
Have a nice day today. I am counselor #@name#
#@Affiliation# This is counselor #@Name#. How may I help you?

Korean: 교재가 배송되어 왔는데 다른걸로 바꾸고 싶어서요
English: The textbook was delivered, but I want to exchange it for something else.
Yes, sir. Could you please tell me your name and contact information?
Yes, my name is #@name# #@phone number#
Yes, thank you for your confirmation. What textbook would you like me to exchange it for?
Yes, I ordered #@product#, but please change it to #@product#
Yes, then I will exchange it for #@product#

Korean: 네 그럼 배송비 따로 다시 내야하나요
English: Yes, then do I have to pay the shipping fee again?

Korean: 네 단순 변심으로 반품 교환하실 경우 2500원을 부담하셔야 합니다
English: If you return or exchange the product due to a simple change of mind, you will be charged 2,500 won.
Okay, then give me your account number.
We will send it to the text message you registered your account with.
Yes, I will check your text.
Yes, have a nice day #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#
This is #@Affiliation#, a counselor full of joy, #@Name#. How may I help you?
I want to return an item, where should I submit it?
Yes, sir, are you talking about a return?
Yes, where do I return it?

Korean: 네 홈페이지에 마이메뉴의 주문목록에서 접수하는 방법이 있구요
English: Yes, there is a way to apply through the order list in My Menu on your homepage.

Korean: 네 고객상담 게시판 혹은 고객센터로 연락을 주시면 됩니다
English: Yes, you can contact us through the customer service bulletin board or customer center.

Korean: 네 반품이나 교환시 택배는 #@소속#에서 접수해드리고 있구요
English: Yes, for returns or exchanges, #@affiliation# handles the delivery.
Yes, you don't have to apply separately.

Korean: 네 별도로 접수하신 경우에는 저희쪽으로 꼭 송장번호 알려주시면 됩니다
English: Yes, if you applied separately, please let us know the invoice number.
Yes, you can call my representative number #@phone number# and let me know.

Korean: 네 맞습니다 좋은 하루 되세요 #@소속# 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다
English: Yes, that's right. Have a nice day. #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#
This is #@Affiliation# counselor #@Name#, full of happiness. How may I help you?

Korean: 교재 배송 조회를 하는데 내역이 안떠서요
English: I'm trying to track my textbook delivery, but the details aren't showing up.
Please tell me your name and contact information.
Yes, my name is #@name#
The number is #@phone#

Korean: 네 고객님 출고된 상품 송장 출력 되었구요
English: Yes, customer, the invoice for the shipped product has been printed.
Okay, then will the details come out tomorrow?

Korean: 네 평일기준 당일 저녁늦게 혹은 다음날부터 조회가 가능합니다
English: Yes, you can check it out late in the evening on the same day or from the next day on weekdays.
Yeah, I guess I'll have to see you again tomorrow.
Yes, do you have any other questions?
No questions
Yes, have a nice day #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#
Hello, this is your friendly #@affiliation# counselor #@name#. How may I help you?

Korean: 오늘 교재주문을 했는데 내일 받을 수 있나해서요
English: I ordered the textbook today, but I was wondering if I could receive it tomorrow.

Korean: 네 고객님 내일 수령되는지 여부를 알고싶으신건가요
English: Yes sir, would you like to know whether it will be received tomorrow?
Yes, that's right. Can I get it?
Yes, sir, when did you order the textbook?
Yes, at 11 am today.

Korean: 네 상품출고는 평일기준 오후 1시 이전 주문완료건은 당일 출고를 해드리고요
English: Yes, for orders placed before 1:00 PM on weekdays, products will be shipped the same day.

Korean: 다만 주문 물량이 많거나 택배사 상황에 따라 1일에서 2일 정도 더 걸리는 경우도 있습니다
English: However, depending on the number of orders or the circumstances of the delivery company, it may take 1 to 2 days longer.

Korean: 네 그럼 내일 못 받을 수도 있겠네요
English: Yeah, then I might not be able to receive it tomorrow.
Would you like to contact your courier?
Yes, I understand. Thank you.
Yes, thank you #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#
This is #@Affiliation#, a representative domestic educator, counselor #@Name#. How may I help you?

Korean: 오늘 교재주문을 했는데 결제내역이 문자로 안와서요
English: I ordered textbooks today, but I didn't receive a text message with the payment details.
Yes, sir, did you not receive the payment details via text message?

Korean: 마이메뉴 회원정보에 휴대폰 번호 맞게 되어있는지 확인 가능하실까요
English: Could you please check if your mobile phone number is correct in your My Menu member information?
Yes, I can confirm.
Yes, then would you like to see the order list in my#@affiliation#menu?
Is the registered number #@phone number# correct?
Yes, your number is correct, but I'm not receiving texts.

Korean: 네 그럼 결제내역 문자로 다시 전송해드리겠습니다
English: Yes, then I will send you the payment details again by text message.
Please send it to me in four characters
Yes, take care of your health. This was counselor #@Affiliation#, #@Name#

Korean: 기쁨 가득한 #@소속# 상담원 #@이름# 입니다 무엇을 도와드릴까요
English: I am #@Affiliation#, a counselor full of joy, #@Name#. How may I help you?
I would like to ask about shipping costs.
Yes, please tell me what you are curious about.
How much do I need to buy to get free shipping?

Korean: 네 배송비는 1만원이상 결제 시 무료배송 해드리고 있고요
English: Yes, shipping is free for purchases over 10,000 won.

Korean: 1만원 이하 결제 시 배송비 2500원이 부과가 됩니다
English: For payments under 10,000 won, a shipping fee of 2,500 won will be charged.

Korean: 무료배송 단독 출고 표시 상품의 경우 합배송이 불가해서요
English: Combined shipping is not possible for products marked as free shipping only.
Yes, then is there a separate shipping fee?

Korean: 아뇨 다른 상품끼리의 결제 금액이 1만원 이상 시 무료배송 됩니다
English: No, if the total payment for other products is over 10,000 won, shipping is free.
Yes, it's free shipping if your purchase exceeds 10,000 won.

Korean: 네 감사합니다 맞습니다 그럼 #@소속# 상담원 #@이름# 이었습니다
English: Yes, thank you. That's right. Then it was #@Affiliation#, counselor #@Name#
Start a happy day #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#
I would like to cancel my order

Korean: 주문 취소는 마이메뉴 주문 목록에서 직접 취소 가능합니다
English: You can cancel your order directly from the My Menu order list.
Yes, I tried it, but it didn't work.

Korean: 주문 취소가 안 되십니까 성함하고 연락처 말씀해 주세요
English: Can't cancel my order? Please tell me your name and contact information.
Your name is #@name#
The number is #@phone#

Korean: 네 확인해보니 주문하신 내역이 상품 준비 중이네요
English: Yes, I checked and the product you ordered is being prepared.

Korean: 네 그럼 주문 취소 안 되나요
English: Yes, then the order can't be cancelled

Korean: 상품 준비중 이후는 직접 취소 불가하시고 저희가 해드려야 해요
English: After the product is being prepared, you cannot cancel it yourself and we will have to do it for you.
Okay, then please contact me.

Korean: 네 주문 취소 해드리고 안 될 경우 반품으로 접수해 드리겠습니다
English: Yes, I will cancel your order and if that doesn't work, I will accept a return.
Yes, please do that.
Yes, thank you. It was #@Affiliation#, counselor #@Name#
This is your friendly #@affiliation# counselor #@name#. How may I help you?
I'm trying to pay online, but the payment isn't working.
What payment method did you use?
Yes, I'll pay by bank transfer.
Yes, can you check the amount of your order?
Okay, just a moment. I'll check.

Korean: 무통장결제 시 입금하실 때 금액이 틀리면 결제가 되지 않습니다
English: If the amount is incorrect when depositing money through bank transfer, the payment will not be processed.
Yes, your order amount is 100,000 won.
Yes, dear customer, can you confirm the name of the product you ordered?
Yes, product name #@product# 10 pieces

Korean: 10개는 추가 배송비 있으니 주문 금액 확인후 재입금 해주시면 됩니다
English: There is an additional shipping fee for 10 items, so please check the order amount and re-deposit.
Yeah, I'll have to check again.

Korean: 네 좋은 하루 되세요 #@소속# 상담원 #@이름# 이었습니다
English: Yes, have a nice day #@Affiliation# This was counselor #@Name#
Hello, this is counselor #@Affiliation#, #@Name#. How may I help you?

Korean: 주문한 상품 현금결제 했는데 현금영수증 발행하고 싶어서요
English: I paid for the product I ordered with cash, but I would like to receive a cash receipt.

Korean: 네 고객님 주문내역 확인을 위해 성함 연락처 말씀해주세요
English: Yes, please tell me your name and contact information so I can check your order details.
Your name is #@name# and your number is #@phone#

Korean: 네 고객님 정보 확인감사합니다 결제시 실시간 계좌이체로 해주셨구요
English: Yes, thank you for confirming the customer information. Please make the payment via real-time account transfer.

Korean: 현금영수증 발행 가능합니다 말씀해주신 연락처로 발행해드릴까요
English: I can issue a cash receipt. Would you like me to issue it to the contact information you provided?
Yes, please do that.
Yes, is the contact number for issuing the cash receipt #@phone number# correct?
Yes, your number is correct.
Yes, the issuance has been completed. This was the counselor #@name#
Yes, take care of your health in this hot weather.
#@Affiliation# This is counselor #@Name#. How may I help you?
I would like to inquire about delivery.
Yes, sir, are you talking about delivery?
Yes, I ordered the textbook, but I want to receive it in person.

Korean: 네 배송은 택배 혹은 우편으로 진행하고 있습니다
English: Yes, we ship via courier or post.

Korean: 네 택배로 했는데 바로 받고 싶어서요
English: Yes, I sent it by courier, but I want to receive it right away.

Korean: 택배로 하셨으면 택배사에서 배송하기 때문에 배송주소로 배송합니다
English: If you order by courier, the courier company will deliver it to your delivery address.
Yes, so I can't pick it up in person?
Yes, direct pickup is difficult

Korean: 네 그냥 문앞에 두고 가라고 해야겠네요
English: Yeah, I guess I'll just have to tell them to leave it at the door.
Yes, do you have any further questions?
No questions

Korean: 무더운 날씨 건강 조심 하세요 #@소속# 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다
English: Take care of your health in this hot weather #@Affiliation# This was counselor #@Name#
This is your friendly #@affiliation# counselor #@name#. How may I help you?
I applied for free delivery but I haven't received it. Can I check the delivery status?
Yes, sir, are you talking about free distribution?
Yes, please check the delivery status.

Korean: 네 무료배포 이벤트는 일반우편으로 발송되어 조회가 불가능합니다
English: Yes, the free distribution event is sent by regular mail and cannot be tracked.
Oh, is it impossible to search?

Korean: 네 발송일 이후 10일이 지나도 못받으셨다면 알려주세요
English: If you haven't received it after 10 days from the shipping date, please let me know.
Yeah, it's been a while, it's been a week
Okay, then I'll resend it to you.
Yes, will it be sent now?
Please tell me the address you would like to receive the delivery to.
Yes, it is #@Address#, Seocho-gu, Seoul

Korean: 네 다시 발송 도와 드리겠습니다 #@소속# 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다
English: Yes, I will help you send it again. It was #@affiliation# counselor #@name#

Korean: 국내 최대 규모 #@소속# 상담원 #@이름#입니다 무엇을 도와드릴까요
English: This is the largest #@affiliation# counselor in the country, #@name#. How may I help you?
I would like to inquire about textbook delivery.
Yes, customer, what is your inquiry about delivery?

Korean: 네 택배사가 파업해서 다른 택배로 바꾸고 싶어서요
English: Yes, the delivery company is on strike, so I want to change to another delivery company.

Korean: 네 #@소속#은 한진과 cj택배를 통해 보내드리고 있구요

English: Yes, I will try it and contact you if it doesn't work.
Thank you and have a nice day.

Korean: 반갑습니다 문의 주신 곳 #@소속# 상담 센터입니다
English: Hello, this is the #@affiliation# counseling center for your inquiry.

Korean: 예 강의 보다가 불편한 점이 있어서요
English: Yes, I was watching the lecture and I had some inconveniences.
Yes, what part was uncomfortable?

Korean: 강의 중에 자막이 나오면 더 좋을 것 같은데 가능할까요
English: It would be better if subtitles were shown during the lecture. Is that possible?
What is your current browser version?
I'm viewing this in Internet Explorer 9.

Korean: 자막 지원의 경우 익스플로어 10이상에서 지원 가능합니다
English: Subtitle support is available in Explorer 10 or later.

Korean: 아 그럼 제가 보는 버전에선 아예 자막이 안 나오나요
English: Oh, so in the version I'm watching, there are no subtitles at all?
Yes, sorry, but it is difficult to support Explorer 9.

Korean: 네 그럼 어쩔 수 없죠 잘 알겠습니다
English: Yes, then there's nothing I can do. I understand.

Korean: 도움 드리지 못한 점 죄송합니다 상담사 #@이름# 이었습니다
English: Sorry I couldn't help you, this was counselor #@name#
This is the #@affiliation#counseling center to start a pleasant day.

Korean: 안녕하세요 제가 로그인을 하려고 하는데 오류가 나서요
English: Hello, I'm trying to log in but I get an error
Yes, what error are you getting?

Korean: 로그인 버튼을 누르면 보안 인증서에 문제가 있습니다 라고 보여요
English: When I click the login button it says there is a problem with the security certificate

Korean: 보안 인증서 문제는 신뢰할 수 있는 사이트 등록을 하시면 되는데요
English: If you have a security certificate problem, you can register it as a trusted site.

Korean: 네 어떻게 하는 지 알려 주시겠어요
English: Yes, please tell me how to do it.

Korean: 인터넷 상단 메뉴의 도구 인터넷옵션 보안 순으로 클릭해 주시고요
English: Click on Tools Internet Options Security in the top menu of the Internet.

Korean: 신뢰할 수 있는 사이트에 사이트 버튼을 누르시면 됩니다
English: Just click the site button on a trusted site

Korean: 아 그럼 보안 설정이 된 건가요
English: Oh, so the security settings are set?

Korean: 네 안내 드린 방법 대로 실행해 보시고도 안 되면 다시 연락 주세요
English: If it doesn't work after following the instructions I gave you, please contact us again.
Yes, thank you for the detailed explanation.

Korean: 저는 상담사 #@이름# 이었습니다 좋은 하루 되세요
English: I am counselor #@name#. Have a nice day.
Nice to meet you, I am #@Affiliation# counselor #@Name#
Yes hello my pc is acting weird
What part do you find strange?

Korean: 강의 들을 때 마다 자꾸 꺼져요
English: Every time I listen to a lecture, it keeps turning off

Korean: 정확한 원인은 원격 점검을 해보셔야 할 것 같습니다
English: I think you'll need to do a remote inspection to find out the exact cause.

Korean: 아 그럼 원격 점검은 어떻게 해야 하죠
English: Oh, then how do I do remote inspection?

Korean: 지금 전화 주신 곳은 상담 센터라 원격 점검이 안되시고요
English: The place you are calling from is a counseling center, so remote inspection is not possible.

Korean: 학습 상담 센터로 문의 하셔야 해요
English: You should contact the Learning Counseling Center.

Korean: 아 네 그럼 번호 알려 주시겠어요
English: Oh, yes, then please tell me your number.
I'll give you my number #@phone number#
Thank you. Take care.
Yes, I hope you had a satisfactory consultation.
How may I help you? This is #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#

Korean: 사이트 로그인 하는데 웹 페이지를 찾을 수 없습니다 라고 해서요
English: When I try to log into the site, it says the webpage cannot be found.

Korean: 네 보안 설정 문제로 보여지는데요 안내에 따라 조치해 주세요
English: Yes, it seems to be a security setting issue. Please follow the instructions.
Yes, what should I do?

Korean: 먼저 상단 도구탭에서 인터넷 옵션 보안 순으로 클릭해 주세요
English: First, click on Internet Options Security in the Tools tab at the top.

Korean: 신뢰할 수 있는 사이트를 클릭하시고 사이트를 눌러 주세요
English: Click on Trusted Sites and click on the site
Then can I just enter the site address?
Yes, just type #@URL#
Yes, I entered it as you told me.

Korean: 다음은 이 영역에 있는 모든 사이트에 대해 서버 확인 보이세요
English: Below you can see the server verification for all sites in this area.
Yes, wait a minute. I can see it.

Korean: 그 부분을 체크 해제하시고 웹 사이트 추가 후 재접속 해주세요
English: Please uncheck that part, add the website, and reconnect.
Yes, I tried connecting again and it worked.

Korean: 또 불편한 사항 있으시면 전화 주세요 감사합니다
English: If you have any further inconveniences, please call me. Thank you.
Good afternoon, this is #@Affiliation# counselor #@Name#

Korean: 제가 오늘 처음 가입하고 접속 시도 했는데 강의가 안 보여요
English: I signed up for the first time today and tried to log in, but I can't see the lecture.

Korean: 홈페이지에 PC 자가 조치 방법 진행은 해보셨나요
English: Have you tried the PC self-help steps on the homepage?

Korean: 이것저것 해봤는데 안돼서요 PC원격 점검을 받고 싶어요
English: I tried this and that but it didn't work. I want to get my PC checked remotely.

Korean: 홈 페이지 상단에 학습장에 원격 상담이 보이실까요
English: Do you see Remote Counseling in the Learning Center at the top of the home page?
Yes, wait, I found it.
If you click, the installation will proceed automatically.
Please call #@phone number# and press the verification number.

Korean: 제가 직접 전화해서 인증 번호 누르면 되나요
English: Can I call myself and press the verification number?

Korean: 맞습니다 원격 상담 버튼 누르신 뒤 전화 주세요
English: Yes, please press the remote consultation button and then call.
Okay, I'll hang up and try it right away.

Korean: 진행 하시다가 막히시면 다시 전화 주세요
English: If you get stuck while proceeding, please call again.
#@Name# is a counselor who delivers happiness to #@affiliation#
I finished the course and want to print out my certificate.
Yes, what part do you need help with?

Korean: 인쇄하려고 했더니 등록 되지 않은 프린트라는데 어떻게 해야 하나요
English: When I try to print, it says that the printer is not registered. What should I do?

Korean: 안내 도와 드릴 건데요 혹시 지금 PC 접속 중이실까요
English: I'll help you with the instructions. Are you connected to a PC right now?
Yes, I'm on the computer right now.
Then, can you access it with #@URL# in the address bar?
Yes, please wait a moment.

Korean: 거기서 프린터 업데이트 프로그램 다운로드 설치 및 진행 보이실까요
English: Can you please show me how to download and install the printer update program there?

Korean: 네 다시 다운로드해서 설치만 하면 될까요
English: Yes, can I just download it again and install it?

Korean: 네 설치 완료 되시면 마이페이지 가서 인쇄하기 눌러 주시면 됩니다
English: Yes, once the installation is complete, go to My Page and click Print.

Korean: 예 지금 하고 있는데 출력 되네요 감사합니다
English: Yes, I'm doing it now and it's printing out. Thank you.
Thank you. I hope you take care not to catch a cold during the changing of seasons.

Korean: 반갑습니다 전화 주신 곳 #@소속# 상담 센터 입니다
English: Hello, this is the #@affiliation# counseling center.

Korean: 안녕하세요 제가 수강하려고 회원 가입을 했는데요
English: Hello, I signed up to take the class.

Korean: 네 회원 가입 후 어떤 문의 사항이 있으신가요
English: Do you have any questions after signing up?
I can't log in after signing up

Korean: 회원 가입 하신 뒤 바로 로그인 해보신 건 가요
English: Did you try logging in right after signing up?

Korean: 네 가입 완료 됐다고 해서 바로 해봤죠
English: Yes, I did it right away because they said my registration was complete.

Korean: 접속 중인 인터넷 창 모두 닫고 다시 홈페이지 접속 해보시겠어요
English: Please close all Internet windows you are connected to and try accessing the website again.

Korean: 아 인터넷 껐다가 다시 들어가라는 거죠
English: Oh, you're telling me to turn off the internet and then turn it back on?

Korean: 네 기존 접속 창 모두 끄고 새창으로 홈페이지 접속 해 주세요
English: Yes, please close all existing connection windows and access the homepage in a new window.
I logged in again and it worked now
Yes, it seems to have been a temporary error
Thanks for the detailed explanation

Korean: 저는 상담원 #@이름# 이었습니다 좋은 하루 되세요
English: I am counselor #@name#. Have a nice day.
Hello, this is #@Affiliation# Counseling Center #@Name#

Korean: 제가 로그인이 안돼서 껐다가 다시 해봤는데요
English: I couldn't log in, so I turned it off and tried again.
But I can't log in. What's the problem?

Korean: 그러세요 혹시 임시 인터넷 파일과 쿠키 삭제도 해보셨나요
English: By the way, have you tried deleting temporary internet files and cookies?

Korean: 네 그것도 해봤는데 아직도 로그인이 안돼요
English: Yes I tried that too but I still can't log in

Korean: 그럼 인터넷 도구에서 호환성 보기 설정으로 들어가 보시겠어요
English: Then, let's go to the Compatibility View settings in Internet Tools.
Oh, wait a minute. I'll go in now.

Korean: 네 호환성 보기 설정으로 가셔서 #@URL# 을 추가하시면 됩니다
English: Yes, you can go to your Compatibility View settings and add #@URL#

Korean: 다 하셨으면 인터넷 창을 닫고 새 창으로 다시 로그인 해보시겠어요
English: When you're done, close the Internet window and try logging in again in a new window.
I logged in and it works now
Yes, I'm glad it worked out.

Korean: 상담사님이 자세히 설명 해준 덕분이에요 감사합니다
English: Thank you, the counselor explained it in detail.

Korean: 감사합니다 다른 문의 사항 있으시면 또 연락 주세요
English: Thank you. Please contact me again if you have any other questions.
Thank you for calling #@URL# This is operator #@name#

Korean: 강의 목록을 확인하려고 하는데 창이 안 떠서요
English: I'm trying to check the lecture list, but the window doesn't open.

Korean: 네 버튼을 눌러도 아무 반응이 없다는 거죠
English: When I press the four buttons, nothing happens.

Korean: 맞아요 창이 떠야 하는데 아무리 눌러도 반응이 없어요
English: Yes, the window should pop up, but no matter how many times I press it, there is no response.

Korean: 그럼 우선 팝업 차단을 확인해 볼텐데요
English: Well, first of all, let's check the pop-up blocker.
Yes, I will try it now. Please tell me.

Korean: 인터넷 도구 메뉴에서 인터넷 옵션 누르시고요
English: Click Internet Options in the Internet Tools menu.

Korean: 개인정보 탭으로 가셔서 팝업 차단 사용에 체크 해주세요
English: Go to the Privacy tab and check Enable pop-up blocker.
Yes, I checked. What's next?

Korean: 다 하셨으면 새로 고침 해주시고 강의 목록 다시 눌러 주세요
English: When you're done, please refresh the page and click on the lecture list again.

Korean: 네 했어요 이제 목록이 뜨네요 감사합니다
English: Yes I did, now the list appears, thank you

Korean: 앞으로도 저희 학습 포털 이용에 많은 관심 부탁 드립니다
English: We ask for your continued interest in using our learning portal.
Hello, I am counselor #@Affiliation#, #@Name#

Korean: 제가 강의를 듣는 중인데요 문제가 있는 것 같아서요
English: I'm taking a lecture and I think there's a problem.
Yes, what is the issue that brought you to my attention?

Korean: 동영상 보다가 끊기고 뒤로가기 눌러도 반응이 없어요
English: The video stops while I'm watching it and there's no response when I press the back button.

Korean: 혹시 네트워크 문제 일 수 있으니 안내해드릴게요
English: I'll let you know in case there's a network problem.

Korean: 아뇨 다른 사이트나 인터넷 했을 땐 괜찮아요
English: No, it's fine when I use other sites or the internet.

Korean: 동영상 볼 때 주로 먹통이 되는 것 같아요
English: I think it mostly goes dead when watching videos
So what browser do you use?
I'm using explorer
Our Explorer service has ended

Korean: 앞으로는 크롬이나 엣지 브라우저 사용 바랍니다
English: Please use Chrome or Edge browser in the future.
Okay, I understand. Thank you for your hard work.

Korean: 다른 문의 사항 생기면 언제든지 연락 바랍니다
English: If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact us at any time.
Nice to meet you, I am #@Affiliation#, a friendly counselor #@Name#

Korean: 안녕하세요 동영상 강의 보다가 궁금한 게 생겨서요
English: Hello, I was watching the video lecture and I had a question.
Yes, what part are you curious about?

Korean: 동영상을 더 크게 볼 순 없을까요
English: Can you make the video bigger?

Korean: 그냥 보고 있는데 너무 작은 거 같아서 눈이 아파요
English: I'm just looking at it, but it's so small that my eyes hurt.

Korean: 많이 불편 하셨을텐데요 전체화면으로 변경 방법 알려드릴게요
English: I know it must have been very inconvenient, but I'll tell you how to change it to full screen.
Yes, please let me know.

Korean: 키보드 오른쪽 상단에 F11 버튼 보이실까요
English: Do you see the F11 button at the top right of your keyboard?
Yes, if I click this, will the screen get bigger?

Korean: 맞습니다 F11버튼 누르시면 전체화면으로 시청 가능하세요
English: Yes, you can view it in full screen by pressing the F11 button.

Korean: 쉬운 방법이 있었네요 알려 주셔서 감사합니다
English: There was an easy way, thanks for letting me know

Korean: 감사합니다 남은 하루도 행복하게 보내시길 바랍니다
English: Thank you and I hope you have a happy rest of your day.
#@Name# is a friendly counselor from #@Affiliation#

Korean: 네 제가 노트북으로 강의를 보고 있는데요
English: Yes, I am watching the lecture on my laptop.
What part do you have questions about?

Korean: 화면이 작은 것 같은데 노트북은 화면 설정을 어떻게 하나요
English: The screen seems small, how do I set the screen settings on my laptop?

Korean: 네 문의 주신 노트북 화면 조정 방법 안내해드릴게요
English: Yes, I will guide you on how to adjust the laptop screen you asked about.

Korean: 지금 바로 가능 하니깐 알려 주시겠어요
English: Could you please let me know if it is possible right now?

Korean: 현재 강의 화면 하단에 화면 비율이라고 보이실까요
English: Do you see the screen ratio at the bottom of the current lecture screen?

Korean: 네 있어요 이걸로 맞추면 되는 거예요
English: Yes, you can. Just match it with this.

Korean: 네 맞습니다 화면 비율 100%로 맞추시면 됩니다
English: Yes, that's right. Just set the screen ratio to 100%.

Korean: 그러네요 이제야 꽉 차게 잘 보이네요
English: Yeah, now it looks full and clear

Korean: 금방 해결 돼서 다행입니다 그럼 좋은 하루 되세요
English: I'm glad it was resolved quickly. Have a nice day.

Korean: 즐거운 하루 되세요 #@소속# 상담 센터 입니다
English: Have a nice day #@Affiliation# This is the counseling center
#@Other# It says on the screen to install the above.

Korean: 네 수강 시 동영상의 원활한 재생을 위해서 입니다
English: Yes, this is for smooth playback of videos during class.
Please tell me where to download it

Korean: 컴퓨터에서 시작 누르시고 모든 프로그램 눌러주세요
English: On your computer, click Start and then click All Programs.
Wait a minute, I just pressed start
When you go into all programs, do you see #@Other#?
Show me, can I press run?

Korean: 네 실행 누르고 플레이어 버전 확인해주시고 업데이트 해주세요
English: Yes, press Run, check the player version, and update.
Oh, this is where you update

Korean: 네 맞습니다 업데이트 하시면 영상 재생 가능하실 거예요
English: Yes, that's right. If you update, you will be able to play the video.
Thank you for your kind guidance.
Thank you, I am counselor #@name#
#@Affiliation# Bright Smile In Charge #@Name#

Korean: 안녕하세요 프로그램이 너무 느린 것 같아서요
English: Hello, I think the program is too slow.
Are your lecture videos very slow?

Korean: 네 그래서 캐시삭제랑 여유공간 확보 하라는데 어디서 해요
English: Yes, so they tell me to clear the cache and free up space, but where do I do that?
Are you currently connected to a PC?
No, if you let me know, I'll take note and try it.

Korean: 캐시삭제는 인터넷 도구 인터넷옵션 삭제로 들어가시고요
English: To delete the cache, go to Internet Tools Internet Options Delete.

Korean: 임시 인터넷파일과 쿠키 삭제 후 새창으로 접속해 주시면 됩니다
English: After deleting temporary Internet files and cookies, please access the site through a new window.
Okay, I understand. Next, how about securing some free space?

Korean: 제어판 프로그램 추가 제거에서 사용하지 않는 프로그램 삭제해 주세요
English: Please delete unused programs from Control Panel Add/Remove Programs.

Korean: 네 상세한 설명 감사합니다 그럼 수고하세요
English: Yes, thank you for the detailed explanation. Thank you for your hard work.
Thank you. Please take care of your health during the changing seasons.
It's a refreshing morning. I'm a counselor from #@Affiliation# and #@Name#.

Korean: 제가 수강한 강의 학습 진도율이 이상해요
English: The learning progress rate of the course I took is strange.
Could you please tell me your learner's name and number?
Your name is #@name# and your number is #@phone#

Korean: 확인 결과 이미 수료 완료 되었다고 나오는데요
English: The verification results show that the course has already been completed.
When I checked, it came out to 78% and 80%.

Korean: 아마 전산 상의 오류였던 것 같습니다
English: I think it was probably a computer error

Korean: 아 그럼 수료 완료 된 거 맞죠
English: Oh, so it's completed?

Korean: 네 수료 완료 하여 수료증 발급 가능하세요
English: Yes, you can complete the course and receive a certificate of completion.
Oh yes I will check it out. Thank you.
Yes, I hope you take care of your health during the changing of seasons.
It's a cool, breezy morning #@Phone#

Korean: #@상품# 강의를 매년 듣고 수료증 출력 중인데요
English: #@Product# I take the class every year and print out the certificate of completion.
Yes, how can I help you?

Korean: #@기타#로 쓰고 있어서 출력하려고 하니 너무 오래 걸려요
English: I'm using #@Other# so it takes too long to print
Are you saying that it takes a long time to print the certificate?

Korean: 네 직인 출력을 해야 해서 프로그램 이용 중인데요
English: I'm using the program because I need to print out my official seal.
It takes 30 minutes to print every time. It's inconvenient.

Korean: #@기타# 경우 아직 호환이 안돼 출력 시간이 오래 걸린 것 같네요
English: #@Other# It seems like it took a long time to print because it is not compatible yet.
Is there any other solution?

Korean: 직인이 생략 된 수료증도 제출용으로 인정되고 있어서요
English: Certificates with omitted seals are also accepted for submission.

Korean: 직인 생략 된 수료증으로 출력하시는 게 좋을 것 같습니다
English: I think it would be better to print it out as a certificate of completion with the seal omitted.

Korean: 네 알겠습니다 #@기타# 호환 되도록 프로그램 변경 부탁 드려요
English: Yes, I understand. Please change the program to make it compatible with #@Other#

Korean: 의견 반영될 수 있도록 노력하겠습니다 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다
English: I will try to reflect your opinion. This was counselor #@name#.

Korean: 문의 주신 곳 #@소속# 상담 센터 입니다
English: The place you are contacting is #@affiliation# counseling center.

Korean: 자격증 수료 강의 찾고 있는데 개설된 강의가 하나도 안 떠요
English: I'm looking for a course to complete the certification, but I can't find any courses that are open.
First of all, I apologize for any inconvenience caused to your learning.

Korean: 강의가 폐강 된 거라 없는 건가요
English: Is it because the class was canceled?

Korean: 잠시만 기다려 주시면 확인 후 안내 도와드리겠습니다
English: Please wait a moment and we will check and assist you.
Okay, I understand. You can take your time.
Thank you for waiting

Korean: 확인 결과 사이트 오류로 검색에 문제가 있었습니다
English: After checking, we found that there was a problem with the search due to a site error.

Korean: 아 그럼 지금 다시 검색하면 될까요
English: Oh, then can I search again now?

Korean: 현재 복구 완료 되었다고 하니 다시 검색 부탁 드립니다
English: They said the recovery is now complete, so please search again.
Yes, I'll try it now. Thank you.

Korean: 이용에 불편을 드려 죄송합니다 상담원 #@이름# 이었습니다
English: We apologize for the inconvenience. This was counselor #@name#.
Nice to meet you, I am #@Affiliation# counselor #@Name#

Korean: 강의 듣기 하려는데 엑셀이나 파워포인트 다 안돼요
English: I'm trying to listen to the lecture, but Excel and PowerPoint don't work.

Korean: 제가 영상 확인 후 다시 안내 드려도 될까요
English: Can I get back to you after I check the video?
Yes, please check and let me know.

Korean: 현재 강의 영상 확인해 보니 모두 정상 재생 되고 있습니다
English: I checked the current lecture videos and they are all playing normally.

Korean: 혹시 특정 강의가 재생이 안되시는 걸까요
English: Are you having trouble playing a specific lecture?

Korean: 아니요 제가 아까 틀었을 때 다 안되더라고요
English: No, when I tried it earlier, it didn't work

Korean: 그렇다면 접속량이 많아 영상 재생이 원활하지 않았던 것 같습니다
English: In that case, it seems that the video playback was not smooth due to a large number of connections.
So it's okay now

Korean: 네 또한 PC환경에 따라 재생이 어려울 수 있습니다
English: Yes, it may also be difficult to play depending on your PC environment.

Korean: 인터넷 익스플로러 보다 크롬으로 사용하시길 바랍니다
English: Please use Chrome rather than Internet Explorer.
Okay, I understand, Chrome instead of Explorer.
Thank you, have a happy day today
It's a sunny morning. This is #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#

Korean: 안녕하세요 제가 수료증 제출을 해야 하는데요
English: Hello, I need to submit my certificate.
Yes, what part do you need help with?

Korean: 분명 수강 완료 했는데 진도율 부족으로 수료 완료가 안됐다고 해서요
English: I clearly completed the course, but it said I didn't complete it because the progress was insufficient.

Korean: 학습자분 성함과 번호 알려 주시면 확인해 보겠습니다
English: Please let me know your name and number so I can check.
Yes, my name is #@name# and my number is #@phone#

Korean: #@이름#님 학습 완료 하신 것으로 나와 있는데요
English: It says that #@Name# has completed the study.

Korean: 아마 프로그램 문제로 오류가 생긴 것 같습니다
English: I think the error is probably due to a program problem.

Korean: 저 이거 제출 해야 하는데 바로 처리 가능할까요
English: I need to submit this. Can you process it right away?

Korean: 네 진도율 반영하여 수료 처리 완료 되었습니다
English: Yes, your progress has been reflected and your completion has been completed.

Korean: 예 감사합니다 그럼 바로 출력 가능 한거죠
English: Yes, thank you. Then you can print it right away.

Korean: 이용에 불편을 드려 죄송합니다 좋은 하루 되세요
English: Sorry for the inconvenience. Have a nice day.

Korean: 양질의 교육을 전하는 #@소속# 상담 센터 입니다
English: This is a #@affiliated# counseling center that provides quality education.

Korean: 안녕하세요 수강생인데 강의 중에 불편함이 있어서요
English: Hello, I am a student and I am experiencing some inconvenience during the lecture.
Yes, did you feel any discomfort?

Korean: 수강 중에 강의 응답이 늦어져서 강의 진도가 안나가요
English: During class, the lecture response is delayed and the lecture progress is not progressing.

Korean: 네 이용에 불편을 드린 점 죄송합니다
English: Yes, we apologize for any inconvenience.
Only our lectures are like this

Korean: 연말에 접속자 증가로 이용에 불편을 드리고 있습니다
English: We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the increase in users at the end of the year.

Korean: 서버 증설 등 문제 해결을 위한 노력 중이니 양해 부탁 드립니다
English: We ask for your understanding as we are working to resolve the issue, including increasing the number of servers.
So how long does it take to get back to normal?

Korean: 빠른 시일 내에 이용 가능하도록 노력하겠습니다
English: We will try to make it available as soon as possible.

Korean: 예 그럼 최대한 빨리 부탁 드려요
English: Yes, then please do it as soon as possible.
Thank you for your understanding, this was counselor #@name#

Korean: 문의 주신 곳은 #@소속# 상담 센터 입니다
English: The place you are contacting is #@affiliation# counseling center.

Korean: 예 지금 시민대학 인강이 안 열리거든요
English: Yes, the Citizens' University lectures are not open right now.
We apologize for any inconvenience.

Korean: 내일까지가 수강 기간인데 재생이 안되면 어떻게 하나요
English: The course period ends tomorrow, but what should I do if I can't play it?

Korean: 최근 서버가 불안정하여 다운된 것 같습니다
English: The server seems to have been unstable recently and is down

Korean: 현재 해당 문제 해결 중에 있으니 양해 부탁 드립니다
English: We are currently working on resolving the issue, so please understand.

Korean: 언제 복구 되는지 알 수 있을까요
English: Can you tell me when it will be restored?
It is expected to be restored this afternoon.

Korean: 알겠습니다 최대한 빨리 해결 부탁 드려요
English: Okay, I'll try to resolve this as quickly as possible.

Korean: 네 다시 한번 이용에 불편을 드려 죄송합니다
English: Yes, once again, I apologize for the inconvenience.
No, it's okay because they said it's being restored
Thank you for your understanding, this was counselor #@name#
Hello, I am #@Name#, the best counselor from #@Affiliation#

English: Yes, hello. I am currently attending a lecture at Citizen University.
The lecture isn't open right now and it's not working.

Korean: 네 현대 서버 구축 중이고 오후에 복구될 예정입니다
English: Yes, we are currently building a modern server and it will be back up this afternoon.

Korean: 근데 인강 기간이 내일까지인데요 이거 연장되나요
English: But the lecture period ends tomorrow. Will it be extended?

Korean: 네 서버 문제로 인해 시민대학 강좌들은 학습 기간 연장됩니다
English: Due to server issues, Citizen University courses will have extended study periods.

Korean: 아 다행이네요 당장 내일 끝나서 어떻게 하나 했는데
English: Oh, thank goodness it ends tomorrow so I was wondering what to do

Korean: 학습 이용에 불편을 드린 점 대단히 죄송합니다
English: We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused to your learning.
No, I understand it's a server issue.

Korean: 감사합니다 최대한 빠르게 복구 완료 하도록 하겠습니다
English: Thank you. We will try to complete the recovery as quickly as possible.

Korean: 네 날씨가 엄청 춥네요 상담사님도 건강 잘 챙기세요
English: Yes, the weather is really cold. Please take care of your health, too.

Korean: 감사합니다 학습자님도 따뜻한 하루 마무리 하세요
English: Thank you, learners, and have a warm day too.
This is the #@affiliation# counseling center that shares warmth.
I'm trying to edit my personal information.
I keep getting errors
What error are you getting?

Korean: 주소 입력하면 유용하지 않은 사이트라고 오류가 나와요
English: When I enter the address, an error message appears saying that the site is not useful.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused while using our website.

Korean: 수강 신청 해야하는데 이거 어떻게 해야해요
English: I need to register for a class, but how do I do it?

Korean: 현재 주소 입력 시스템 오류로 임시 주소를 입력해드렸습니다
English: We have entered a temporary address due to an error in the current address input system.

Korean: 그럼 수강 신청 다시 하면 될까요
English: Then can I apply for the course again?

Korean: 네 수강 신청 후 주소 변경 부탁 드립니다
English: Yes, please change your address after registering for the course.
Okay, then take care.
This is counselor #@name#. Have a nice day.
Hello, this is #@affiliation# counseling center.

Korean: 네 제가 수강 중인 강의 기간에 문제가 있어서요
English: Yes, I have a problem with the course I am taking.
What problem are you having?
The lecture training period was stated to be 30 days.

Korean: 수강 신청 후 학습 시간엔 15일로 되어있어요
English: After registering for the course, the study period is 15 days.

Korean: 네 교육 시간에 혼란을 드린 점 죄송합니다
English: I apologize for any confusion during your training time.
This lecture period can be extended by 30 days.

Korean: 네 기간 오류로 잘못 안내 된 것 같습니다
English: I think you were misguided by the four period error

Korean: 그럼 따로 기간 연장을 안해도 되는 건가요
English: Then, does that mean I don't need to extend the period separately?

Korean: 시스템 오류로 인한 거라 제가 다시 수정해드렸습니다
English: It was due to a system error, so I fixed it again.

Korean: 네 그럼 바로 이용하면 되는 거죠
English: Yes, then you can use it right away.

Korean: 네 그렇습니다 다른 문의 사항 있으실까요
English: Yes, that's right. Do you have any other questions?

Korean: 아니요 수정 됐다고 하니 별 문제 없을 것 같아요
English: No, I don't think there will be any problem since you said it was fixed.
Yes, thank you, this was counselor #@name#
The center of education is #@affiliation# counselor #@name#

Korean: 현재 직업 상담사 수강을 하고 있는데요
English: I am currently taking a career counseling course.

Korean: 네 어떤 부분 문의 사항이 있으실까요
English: Yes, what part do you have questions about?
The video quality is so bad
We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause to your learning.

Korean: 해당 문제를 발견하여 현재 조치 중입니다
English: We have discovered the issue and are currently taking action.

Korean: 뭐가 문제길래 영상이 깨져 보인 건가요
English: What's wrong with the video that it looks broken?

Korean: 콘텐츠 제작 시 인코딩의 문제 였던 것 같습니다
English: I think it was an encoding issue when creating the content.

Korean: 그럼 앞으로는 영상 화질이 좋아지는 거 맞죠
English: So, video quality will improve in the future, right?

Korean: 네 동일한 콘텐츠 품질이 나오도록 테스트 중입니다
English: Yes, we are testing to ensure the same content quality.
Okay, I understand. Thanks for your hard work.

Korean: 감사합니다 불편하시더라도 조금만 양해 부탁 드립니다
English: Thank you. I appreciate your understanding even if it is inconvenient.
Thank you for your inquiry. This is counselor #@Affiliation#, #@Name#.

Korean: 제가 어플 깔고 로그인을 했는데 로그인 유지가 안되고요
English: I installed the app and logged in, but I can't stay logged in.

Korean: 로그인 시 다시 로그아웃 된다는 말씀이신가요
English: Are you saying that when you log in, you get logged out again?

Korean: 네 맞아요 그리고 어플 이미지 업로드도 안되고요
English: Yes, that's right, and the app image upload doesn't work either.

Korean: 우선 이용에 불편을 끼쳐 드린 점 대단히 죄송합니다
English: First of all, we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Korean: 확인 결과 프로그램에 오류가 있어 다시 수정해놓은 상태입니다
English: After checking, we found an error in the program and have revised it.

Korean: 그래요 그럼 다시 해보고 연락 드릴게요
English: Okay, I'll try again and get back to you.

Korean: 네 어플 사용에 문제가 있으실 경우 담당 부서가 있는데요
English: If you have any problems using your app, there is a department in charge.
Can I help you with the number?
Okay then please let me know
Yes, this is the Learning Counseling Center #@Phone#
If there's any problem, I'll contact you. Thank you.

Korean: 감사합니다 앞으로도 저희 서비스 이용에 많은 관심 부탁 드립니다
English: Thank you. We hope you will continue to use our services.
I received a call from counselor #@name# from #@affiliation#

Korean: 교육장 와이파이 문제도 여기서 말씀드리면 될까요
English: Can I also talk about the training center wifi issue here?
What is the issue that brought you to our attention?
#@Affiliation#'s Wi-Fi connection is not good and is slow

Korean: 아 그러셨어요 이용에 불편을 드려 죄송합니다
English: Oh, I see. Sorry for the inconvenience.

Korean: 네 인터넷이 필요한 강의 시에 더욱 불편하네요
English: Yes, it is even more inconvenient during lectures that require internet access.
I will forward this matter to the person in charge of #@affiliation#
Okay, then please

Korean: 시일이 걸릴 수 있는 점 양해 부탁 드립니다
English: Please understand that this may take some time.

Korean: 예 감사합니다 그럼 좋은 하루 되세요
English: Yes, thank you. Have a nice day.

Korean: 감사합니다 앞으로 서비스 개선을 위해 많은 문의 바랍니다
English: Thank you. Please contact us for further service improvement.

Korean: 교육의 선두 주자 #@소속# 상담 센터 입니다
English: This is the #@affiliation# counseling center, a leader in education.
Hello, I am someone who is learning with a tablet.
I'm contacting you because I keep getting errors.

Korean: 그럼 태블릿 기기 관련 오류 접수 맞으세요
English: Then please report any errors related to tablet devices.

Korean: 네 프로그램을 틀고 얼마 있다가 다시 꺼지거든요
English: Yes, the program starts and then turns off again after a while.

Korean: 실례지만 태블릿 관련 상담의 경우 안내 사항 있어서요
English: Excuse me, but I have some instructions for tablet-related inquiries.

Korean: 먼저 태블릿을 소지하시고 와이파이 켜 둔 상태에서 진행해 주세요
English: First, please carry your tablet and turn on Wi-Fi.

Korean: 그래요 제가 지금은 패드가 없는데 어쩌죠
English: Yeah, I don't have a pad right now, what should I do?

Korean: 네 아무래도 말로 설명 드리는 것에 한계가 있어서요
English: Yes, I guess there are limits to what I can explain in words.

Korean: 그렇죠 기계를 보면서 설명하는 게 더 빠르니깐요
English: Yes, it's faster to explain while looking at the machine.

Korean: 네 그럼 태블릿 소지 후 다시 연락 주시겠어요
English: Okay, then please contact me again after you get the tablet.

Korean: 그래야겠네요 똑같은 번호로 하면 되는 거죠
English: I guess so. Just use the same number.

Korean: 네 번거로우시겠지만 다시 연락 바랍니다 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다
English: Yes, I know it's a bit of a hassle, but please call back. This was counselor #@name#.

Korean: 다양한 교육을 제공하는 #@소속# 상담 센터 입니다
English: This is a #@affiliated# counseling center that provides various education.
Yes, I started learning on a tablet.
Yes, do you have any questions?
It tells me to contact my IT administrator.
Is this the tablet you used before?
It's what your son used.

Korean: 아마 자녀분 #@소속# 계정으로 설정되어있어서 그런 것 같아요
English: I think it's probably because your child's account is set to #@affiliation#
Then can I delete my account?

Korean: 계정 및 백업 메뉴로 가셔서 자녀분 계정 삭제 해주세요
English: Go to the Accounts and Backup menu and delete your child's account.

Korean: 그래요 그럼 해보고 다시 연락 드릴게요
English: Okay, I'll try it and get back to you.

Korean: 네 안되면 다시 연락 주시길 바랍니다 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다
English: Yes, if not, please contact me again. This was counselor #@name#

Korean: 양질의 교육을 제공하는 #@소속# 상담 센터 입니다

Hello, I logged into Growth Plate on my tablet.
Yes, what part were you curious about?

Korean: 로그인 버튼이 없는데 어디서 해야 해요
English: There is no login button, where should I do it?

Korean: 아마 태블릿 화면 비율이 잘못된 것 같습니다
English: I think your tablet screen ratio is wrong
Then how do I change it?
What tablet model do you have?
It says #@Product#

Korean: 홈에서 설정 디스플레이 글자 크기와 스타일 순으로 들어가 주시고요
English: Go to Settings Display Font Size and Style in Home.

Korean: 화면 확대는 왼쪽 두번째 칸 글자 크기는 왼쪽 3번째 칸이요
English: The screen magnification is the second box from the left, and the font size is the third box from the left.

Korean: 이게 기본 화면 사이즈 인 거죠
English: This is the basic screen size
Yes, that's right, it's the basic size
Thanks for resetting it, thanks

Korean: 문의 사항 있으면 연락 주세요 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다
English: If you have any questions, please contact our counselor #@name#

Korean: 전화 주신 곳 #@소속# 상담 센터 입니다
English: The place you are calling from is #@affiliation# counseling center.

Korean: 예 저희 애가 태블릿으로 보다가 뭘 잘 못 만진 것 같은데요
English: Yes, my child was looking at the tablet and I think he touched something wrong.
The screen is too big to see the buttons

Korean: 아마 화면 비율에 문제가 생긴 것 같네요
English: I think there's something wrong with the aspect ratio
Then how do I fix it back to the original?
If you turn the tablet over, the model name is listed in English.
Yes, it says #@Product#

Korean: 설정 디스플레이 누르면 글꼴 및 화면 확대에 조정하는 바가 있습니다
English: Tap on Settings Display and there are bars to adjust the font and screen magnification.

Korean: 화면 확대는 왼쪽에서2번째 글자 크기는 왼쪽에서 3번째입니다
English: The screen magnification is the second from the left and the font size is the third from the left
This is to adjust it to the original size
Yes, this is the default aspect ratio.
Yes, thank you for your kind information.
Thank you, I was your counselor #@name#
Nice to meet you, I am #@Affiliation# counselor #@Name#

Korean: 네 안녕하세요 지금 태블릿 PC 이용 중인데요
English: Yes, hello, I'm currently using a tablet PC.
Yes, which part would you like me to guide you on?

Korean: 제가 화면을 조정하다가 잘못 만졌나 봐요
English: I think I touched the wrong thing while adjusting the screen
If you tell me in detail, I will guide you right away.
The screen is completely cut off and I can't even log in.
Yes, then I will help you reset the settings.
If you let me know right away, I'll try it.

Korean: 홈 화면 설정에서 일반 초기화 들어가셔서요
English: Go to General Reset in Home Screen Settings

Korean: 설정 초기화 눌러 주시면 기본 사이즈로 변경되세요
English: If you press Reset Settings, it will change to the default size.
Will the app and other things remain the same?

Korean: 네 기본 설정 값이 다시 초기화 되는거라 괜찮습니다
English: Yes, it's okay because the default settings are reset.
Okay, thanks for the detailed explanation.

Korean: 다른 문의 사항 있으시면 언제든 연락 주세요
English: If you have any further questions, please contact us at any time.

Korean: 전화 주신 곳 #@소속# 상담 센터 입니다
English: The place you are calling from is #@affiliation# counseling center.
Hello, I am using #@affiliation# for learning.
What help do you need?

Korean: #@소속# 학습관의 크롬 캐시 삭제 방법을 알고 싶어서요
English: #@Affiliation# I want to know how to clear the Chrome cache in the learning center
Yes, are you currently connected to the learning center?
Yes, I'm online now

Korean: #@소속# 홈페이지 주소창 오른쪽 점 세 개 보이실까요
English: #@Affiliation# Do you see the three dots on the right side of the homepage address bar?
I see three dots

Korean: 다음 설정 개인정보 및 보안 인터넷 기록 삭제 순으로 눌러 주세요
English: Click on the following settings: Privacy and Security Delete Internet History

Korean: 예 마지막에 체크 나오는데 다 체크 하나요
English: Yes, there is a checkbox at the end, so do you check them all?

Korean: 체크하시고 하단에 인터넷 사용 기록 삭제 버튼 클릭해 주세요
English: Please check and click the Delete Internet Usage History button at the bottom.

Korean: 네 자세히 알려 주셔서 완료했네요 감사합니다
English: Yes, thank you for explaining it in detail. I completed it.

Korean: 다른 문의 있으시면 언제든 연락 주세요 상담원 #@이름# 이었습니다
English: If you have any other questions, please contact me anytime. This was counselor #@name#

Korean: 상쾌한 아침을 여는 #@소속# 상담 센터 #@이름# 입니다
English: This is #@Affiliation# Counseling Center #@Name#, opening a refreshing morning.

Korean: 안녕하세요 저희 아이가 #@소속# 학습관 이용 중 인데요
English: Hello, my child is using the #@affiliation# learning center.

Korean: 네 학부모님 어떤 문의 사항 있으신가요
English: Yes, parents, do you have any questions?

Korean: 로그인을 하면 로그인이 안되고 새로고침만 돼요
English: When I try to log in, it doesn't log in and just refreshes.
Yes, are you currently connected?
Yes, this is the learning center login page.

Korean: 그럼 주소창 점 3개 누르고 설정 개인정보 및 보안 눌러주시겠어요
English: Then, please click on the three dots in the address bar and click on Settings, Privacy and Security.
Yes, please speak slowly.

Korean: 그다음 인터넷 사용 기록 삭제 눌러 주세요
English: Then click on Delete Internet Usage History

Korean: 그럼 체크하는 창이 나오는데 3항목 다 체크 해주시고요
English: Then a check window will appear. Please check all three items.

Korean: 인터넷 사용 기록 삭제 클릭 눌러 주시고 재 로그인 해보시겠어요
English: Please click on Delete Internet Usage History and try logging in again.
I'm logged in now, thank you

Korean: 앞으로 이용에 불편 있으시면 언제든 연락 주세요 감사합니다
English: If you experience any inconvenience in the future, please contact us at any time. Thank you.

Korean: 높은 교육을 제공하는 #@소속# 상담 센터 #@이름# 입니다
English: This is #@Affiliation# Counseling Center #@Name#, which provides high-quality education.
I'm using a tablet #@affiliation#

Korean: 프로그램을 틀면 마이크 설정이 안됐다고 뜨는데요
English: When I run the program, it says that the microphone is not set up.

Korean: 학습기 이용 중 마이크 사용이 안된다는 거죠
English: You're saying that you can't use the microphone while using the learning device?

Korean: 네 그런 것 같아요 이건 어디서 설정을 해요
English: Yes, I think so. Where do I set this?
Are you currently able to access your tablet?
Yes, I'm online now

Korean: 그럼 #@소속# 웹 주소창 왼쪽에 자물쇠 모양 보이세요
English: Then, you will see a lock icon on the left side of the #@affiliation# web address bar.
Can you press the lock icon?

Korean: 네 설정 사이트 설정에 카메라 허용 상태를 확인 및 변경해 주세요
English: Yes, please check and change the camera permission status in the settings site settings.

Korean: 변경했어요 그럼 다시 로그인해서 이용하면 될까요
English: I changed it. Can I log in again and use it?

Korean: 네 맞습니다 이용해 보시고 해결 안되시면 연락 주시겠어요
English: Yes, that's right. Please try it and if it doesn't work, please contact me.
Okay, I'll try it and get back to you.

Korean: 감사합니다 남은 하루도 행복하게 마무리 하시길 바랍니다
English: Thank you, I hope you have a happy rest of your day.

Korean: 안녕하세요 #@소속# 상담 센터의 친절한 상담원 #@이름# 입니다
English: Hello, I am #@Name#, a friendly counselor from #@Affiliation# Counseling Center.

Korean: 네 안녕하세요 지금 #@소속# 학습관 이용 중인데요
English: Yes, hello. I am currently using the #@affiliation# study room.

Korean: 마이크 설정을 하려고 하는데 어디에서 하는지 못 찾겠어요
English: I'm trying to set up my microphone, but I can't find where to do it.

Korean: 네 마이크 설정 방법 안내해 드릴텐데 현재 홈페이지 접속 중이실까요
English: Yes, I will guide you on how to set up your microphone. Are you currently on the website?
If you let me know, I'll make a note of it and try it out.
Okay, I'll explain it to you slowly, so why don't you try it?

Korean: 네 메모 준비 됐으니 알려 주세요
English: Yes, please let me know when your notes are ready.

Korean: 주소창에 자물쇠 모양 클릭 후 설정 사이트 설정 순으로 누르시고요
English: Click on the lock icon in the address bar, then click on Settings and Site Settings.

Korean: 마이크 권한 허용 상태를 확인 및 변경 해주시면 됩니다
English: You can check and change the microphone permission status.

Korean: 아 어플 설정에서 하는 게 아니구나
English: Oh, it's not something you do in the app settings.

Korean: 네 웹 사이트 설정에서 확인해 주시면 됩니다
English: You can check it in your website settings

Korean: 알겠어요 그럼 제가 해보고 안되면 다시 연락 드릴게요
English: Okay, I'll try it and if it doesn't work I'll get back to you.

Korean: 네 어려운 부분 생기시면 언제든 연락 주세요
English: Yes, if you have any difficulties, please contact me anytime.
The beginning of a happy day #@Affiliation# Counseling Center #@Name#

Korean: 예 안녕하세요 저희 아이가 태블릿으로 #@상품#을 하는데요
English: Yes, hello, my child is playing #@product# on a tablet.

Korean: 자꾸 카메라 설정을 다시 해달라는데 이게 뭐에요
English: It keeps asking me to reset my camera settings, what is this?

Korean: 고객님 학습관 이용 중에 카메라 권한 설정을 하셔야 하는데요
English: You need to set camera permissions while using the customer learning center.

Korean: 네 그럼 권한 설정 방법 알려주세요
English: Yes, then please tell me how to set permissions.

Korean: 그럼 주소창 오른쪽에 보시면 자물쇠 모양이 있는데요
English: If you look to the right of the address bar, you will see a lock icon.

Korean: 클릭하시고 설정 사이트설정 까지 눌러 주세요
English: Click and press Settings Site Settings

Korean: 네 여기 카메라 권한 허용 상태 확인 및 변경이라고 떠요
English: Yes, it says here Check and change camera permission status.

Korean: 맞습니다 눌러 주시면 카메라 권한 설정이 되신 거예요
English: Yes, if you click on it, you will have set the camera permission.

Korean: 그렇구나 무조건 권한 설정이 되야 학습관 이용이 가능한가요
English: I see. Is it true that I have to set permissions unconditionally to use the learning center?

Korean: 네 마이크와 카메라 설정은 해두셔야 합니다
English: Yes, you need to set up your microphone and camera.
Okay, thanks to you, I solved it. Thanks for your hard work.

Korean: 감사합니다 환절기에 건강 유의 하시길 바랍니다
English: Thank you. I hope you stay healthy during the changing of seasons.

Korean: 높은 교육을 실천하는 #@소속# 상담 센터 입니다
English: We are a #@affiliated# counseling center that practices high education.
I am using the #@affiliation# learning center with a tablet.

Korean: 네 어떤 문의 사항으로 전화 주셨을까요
English: Yes, what is the reason you are calling?

Korean: 자꾸 오류가 뜨는데 이거 어떻게 해요
English: I keep getting an error. What should I do?
Could you please elaborate on what the error is?

Korean: 허가 받지 않은 어플리케이션 입니다 라고 떠요
English: It says "This is an unauthorized application"

Korean: 네 아마 브라우저의 문제 때문인 것 같은데요
English: Yes, I think it's probably a browser issue.

Korean: 웹 사이트 브라우저를 크롬으로 설정해 주셔야 합니다
English: You must set your website browser to Chrome

Korean: 아 그럼 학습관 접속 시 크롬으로 접속하라고요
English: Oh, then when you access the learning center, you have to access it with Chrome.

Korean: 네 기본 브라우저를 크롬으로 설정해두시면 됩니다
English: Yes, you can set your default browser to Chrome.
Yes, then I'll try setting it to Chrome.

Korean: 네 문의 사항 있으시면 또 연락 주세요 상담원 #@이름# 이었습니다
English: Yes, if you have any questions, please contact me again. This was counselor #@name#
#@Affiliation# I am a friendly counselor at the counseling center, #@Name#

Korean: 네 #@소속# 학습관 이용 중에 궁금한 게 있어서요
English: Yes, I have a question while using the #@affiliation# study room.
What part were you curious about?

Korean: 학습관 접속 시 크롬으로 들어가라고 안내 받았거든요
English: When I accessed the learning center, I was told to use Chrome.

Korean: 네 맞습니다 원활한 학습을 위해 크롬으로 안내 드리고 있습니다
English: Yes, that's right. We are guiding you to Chrome for smooth learning.

Korean: 그럼 인터넷 사용 할 때마다 크롬으로 뜰 수 있게 못하나요
English: Then can't I make it so that Chrome opens every time I use the Internet?
You can set it as your default browser.
Where do I set my default browser?

Korean: 태블릿 전체 앱 설정에서 애플리케이션 누르시고요
English: In the tablet's full app settings, tap Applications

Korean: 크롬 누르시면 기본으로 설정이라는 메뉴가 있습니다
English: If you click on Chrome, there is a menu called Set as Default.

Korean: 그렇게 설정하면 접속 때마다 크롬으로 뜨는 거에요
English: If you set it like that, it will open in Chrome every time you connect.

Korean: 네 맞습니다 인터넷 접속 시 크롬으로 들어가세요
English: Yes, that's right. When you access the Internet, go to Chrome.
Yes, I understand. Thank you for the explanation.

Korean: 감사합니다 앞으로도 저희 학습관 이용에 많은 관심 부탁 드립니다
English: Thank you. We hope you will continue to use our learning center.
Hello, this is counselor #@name# from #@affiliation# who received the call.
I am a parent of a newly registered elementary school student.

Korean: 네 어머님 어떤 문의 사항 있으실까요
English: Yes, mother, do you have any questions?

Korean: 저희 아이가 자기주도 학습을 하고 싶어하는데요
English: My child wants to do self-directed learning.

Korean: 혹시 정규 수업 시간 전에 가서 공부할 수 있는 곳이 있나요
English: Is there a place I can go and study before regular class hours?
Our language school has a learning management office and a reading room.

Korean: 그럼 아무때나 가서 스스로 공부하면 될까요
English: Then can I go and study on my own whenever I want?
There is also a learning management office managed by a learning homeroom teacher.

Korean: 독서실도 있으니 둘 중에 선택하시면 될 것 같습니다
English: There is also a reading room, so you can choose between the two.

Korean: 컴퓨터도 할 수 있나요 아님 패드를 가지고 다녀야 할까요
English: Can I use the computer or do I need to carry a pad?
There are also computers for online learning.
The facilities are well-equipped. Thank you for the explanation.

Korean: 앞으로도 저희 어학원 시설 이용에 많은 관심 부탁 드립니다
English: We ask for your continued interest in using our language school facilities.
This is the #@affiliation# counseling center that can help you with anything.
Hello, I am a mother of an elementary school student.
Yes, mother, how can I help you?
I'm trying to do online learning on a tablet.
How to use it

Korean: 사용하시는 기기가 어떤 건지 말씀 해주시겠습니까
English: Could you please tell me what device you are using?
Yes, we have Galaxy Tab.
Visit our website on your tablet
Click on the three dots next to the address bar

Korean: 그다음 데스크톱 사이트 라는 탭을 눌러 주시고 이용하시면 됩니다
English: Then, click on the tab called Desktop Site and use it.

Korean: 아 그러고 바로 온라인 영어 학습 누르면 되는 건가요
English: Oh, and then I just have to click on online English learning?

Korean: 네 갤럭시 탭은 PC버전으로 바로 이용 가능하세요
English: Yes, your Galaxy Tab can be used directly in the PC version.
Okay, thanks for the detailed explanation.

Korean: 이용 중 불편하시면 언제든 연락 주세요 상담원 #@이름# 이었습니다
English: If you have any inconvenience while using the service, please contact us at any time. This was the counselor #@name#.
We are a #@affiliated #counseling center that educates with the best curriculum.

Korean: 안녕하세요 온라인 학습을 휴대폰으로 보고 싶은데요
English: Hello, I would like to view online learning on my mobile phone.

Korean: 네 사용하고 계시는 휴대폰이 기종이 무엇일까요
English: Yes, what model of cell phone are you using?
I'm using #@product# right now

Korean: 네 삼성 제품 온라인 학습 안내 도와드리겠습니다
English: Yes, I will help you with online learning guide for Samsung products.
Please go to our #@affiliation# homepage

Korean: 우측 하단 맨 아래 점 세 개 보이실까요
English: Do you see the three dots at the bottom right?

Korean: 네 즐겨찾기 표시 있는 곳 맞죠
English: Yes, that's where your favorites are displayed.

Korean: 맞습니다 점 세 개 눌러 주시고요
English: Yes, please click on the three dots.

Korean: 다른 브라우저 #@소속# 인터넷 또는 #@기타# 눌러 주시면 됩니다
English: You can press #@affiliation# internet or #@other# in another browser.

Korean: 그리고 끝인가요 온라인 학습 바로 시작해도 되나요
English: And that's it? Can I start online learning right away?

Korean: 네 다른 브라우저 설정하셨으니 바로 이용 가능합니다
English: Yes, you have set up another browser, so you can use it right away.
Thank you for your kind explanation.

Korean: 어려움이 생기면 또 연락 주세요 상담원 #@이름# 이었습니다
English: If you have any difficulties, please contact me again. This was counselor #@name#
Hello, I am a counselor from #@Affiliation# Counseling Center #@Name#
I am currently a parent of an elementary school student.
Yes, mother, how may I help you?
I would like to see online English learning as a #@product#
When I go to the website and run it, an error occurs.

Korean: 아이 패드의 경우 원활한 실행을 위해 #@기타#를 설치하셔야 합니다
English: For iPad, you need to install #@Other# for smooth running
Then is it okay to enter #@Other#?

Korean: 네 #@기타# 앱을 먼저 깔아 주시고 홈페이지 접속 해주세요
English: Yes, please install the #@Other# app first and then access the website.

Korean: 그리고 주소 창 오른쪽 점 세 개 눌러 주시고요
English: Then click on the three dots on the right side of the address bar.

Korean: 데스크톱 버전 탭 눌러 주신 후 이용하시면 됩니다
