English: I heard there are pet friendly rooms. Is that correct?

Korean: 맞습니다 저희 호텔에 지정된 펫 동반 객실이 있습니다
English: Yes, we have designated pet-friendly rooms in our hotel.

Korean: 그럼 강아지 말고 고양이도 투숙이 가능한가요
English: Then, are cats allowed to stay as well as dogs?

Korean: 저희 호텔의 펫 동반 객실은 반려견만 출입 가능하세요
English: Only dogs are allowed in our hotel's pet-friendly rooms.

Korean: 그래요 펫 동반이라고 해서 고양이도 될 줄 알았는데 아쉽네요
English: Yeah, I thought cats would be allowed since it said pets were allowed, but that's too bad.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused during your stay at the hotel.

Korean: 아니에요 그럼 다른 곳을 알아봐야겠네요 그럼 수고하세요
English: No, then I guess I'll have to look elsewhere. Well then, take care.
Thank you and have a nice day today.
Start your day with a good feeling #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#

Korean: 안녕하세요 호텔 예약을 하려고 하는데 물어볼 게 있어서요
English: Hello, I'm trying to make a hotel reservation and I have a question.
Yes, which part can I help you with?

Korean: 저희가 총 3명이라 트리플룸으로 예약을 하려고 하는데요
English: There are three of us, so we would like to reserve a triple room.

Korean: 침구 추가를 해서 바닥에서 자면 되나요
English: Can I sleep on the floor with extra bedding?

Korean: 숙박 인원이 3분이시니까 따로 침구 추가를 하지 않으셔도 됩니다
English: Since there are 3 people staying, you do not need to add extra bedding.

Korean: 그럼 3명이 한 침대에 잘 수 있는 거에요
English: Then three people can sleep in one bed.

Korean: 트리플룸은 싱글침대 3개가 배치되어 있어 각 침대에서 주무시면 됩니다
English: The triple room has three single beds, so you can sleep on each bed.
Oh, there are three beds.

Korean: 맞습니다 기준 인원도 3명이라 추가 요금은 별도로 없고요
English: Yes, the standard number of people is 3, so there is no additional charge.

Korean: 네 자세히 알려주셔서 감사해요 그럼 좋은 하루 되세요
English: Yes, thank you for the detailed explanation. Have a nice day.

Korean: 감사합니다 저희 호텔에서 즐거운 시간 되시길 바랍니다
English: Thank you and we hope you have a nice time at our hotel.

Korean: 기분 좋은 하루를 시작하는 #@소속# 호텔 입니다
English: This is the #@affiliation# hotel that starts a pleasant day.
We booked a triple room.
Yes, which part do you need guidance on?

Korean: 침구 추가를 해야 된다고 하던데 맞나요
English: Is it true that I need to add bedding?
How many people will be staying?
There are 4 people so it says to add extra bedding.
A triple room is a room with three single beds.

Korean: 4인 이용 시 1인 추가요금과 침구 추가 요금이 별도 입니다
English: When 4 people use the room, an additional fee for 1 person and an additional fee for bedding are charged separately.

Korean: 그럼 침구는 따로 추가를 안해도 되는 건가요
English: Then, do I not need to add bedding separately?

Korean: 안하셔도 되지만 한 분은 바닥에서 주무셔야 해서 필요하실텐데요
English: You don't have to do it, but one person will have to sleep on the floor, so it might be necessary.

Korean: 인원 추가 요금만 내면 자는 건 알아서 하려고요
English: I'll take care of sleeping if you just pay the extra person fee.

Korean: 그렇다면 침구 추가는 필수로 하지 않으셔도 됩니다
English: In that case, you don't have to add bedding.
Okay, I understand. Thank you for your hard work.
Thank you, counselor #@name#

Korean: 즐거운 여행의 #@소속# 호텔 안내 센터 입니다
English: This is the #@affiliation# hotel information center for a pleasant trip.

Korean: 안녕하세요 호텔에 강아지 전용 객실이 있다고 하는데 맞나요
English: Hello, I heard that the hotel has a dog-friendly room. Is that true?

Korean: 네 저희 유탑마리나 객실에 펫 전용 객실이 있습니다
English: Yes, we have pet-friendly rooms in our Yutop Marina guest rooms.

Korean: 그럼 펫 전용 객실에 강아지는 몇 마리까지 가능할까요
English: So how many dogs can be allowed in a pet-friendly room?

Korean: 객실 이용 기준으로 한마리이고 추가로 한마리 더 이용 가능하세요
English: One per room, and one more can be added

Korean: 그럼 최대 두마리까지 숙박 가능하다는 거죠
English: So, that means up to two can stay.

Korean: 네 맞습니다 한 마리는 추가 요금이 있으시고요
English: Yes, that's right. There is an additional charge for one.
Okay, I understand.
Do you have any other questions?
No, that's enough. Thank you for explaining it in detail.

Korean: 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다 반려견과 행복한 여행 되시길 바랍니다
English: This is counselor #@name#. I hope you have a happy trip with your dog.

Korean: 즐거운 아침을 여는 #@소속# 안내 센터 입니다
English: This is the #@affiliation# information center that opens a pleasant morning.

Korean: 강아지랑 같이 입실 가능한 객실이 있는 걸로 아는데요
English: I know there are rooms where you can stay with your dog.

Korean: 네 펫 동반 객실 안내 도와드릴까요
English: Yes, can I help you with pet-friendly rooms?

Korean: 네 그런데 저희가 성인이 4명인데 이용 가능할까요
English: Yes, but we are 4 adults. Is it possible for us to use it?

Korean: 저희 펫 동반 객실은 펫 더블룸과 펫 트윈 룸이 있으신데요
English: We have pet double rooms and pet twin rooms for our pet-friendly rooms.
Were there twin rooms too? I only saw double rooms.
Yes, a double room can accommodate two adults.
Twin room can accommodate up to 4 people
So what size is the bed?

Korean: 트윈룸 침대 사이즈는 퀸사이즈 하나와 더블사이즈 하나 입니다
English: Twin room bed sizes are one queen size and one double size.
It's enough for 4 people to sleep.

Korean: 네 그렇습니다 그럼 다른 문의 사항 있으실까요
English: Yes, that's right. Do you have any other questions?
No, it's okay. Then take care.

Korean: 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다 행복한 여행 준비 되시길 바라겠습니다
English: This is counselor #@name#. I hope you have a happy trip.

Korean: 화창한 아침에 인사드립니다 여수 #@소속# 안내 센터 입니다
English: Greetings on a sunny morning. This is the Yeosu #@affiliation# information center.

Korean: 이번에 펫 동반 객실을 예약 했는데요
English: This time, I booked a pet-friendly room.

Korean: 네 어떤 문의 사항으로 전화 주셨을까요
English: Yes, what is the reason you are calling?

Korean: 펫 동반이면 호텔 내에 강아지 전용 물건들이 비치되어 있나요
English: If I bring a pet, is there anything special for dogs in the hotel?

Korean: 네 저희 호텔 객실에 펫 전용 어메니티가 제공이 됩니다
English: Yes, our hotel rooms provide pet-friendly amenities.
What amenities will be provided?

Korean: 애견 침대와 계단 밥그릇 물그릇 배변판 배변패드 제공되고요
English: Dog beds, stairs, food bowls, water bowls, litter boxes, and litter pads are provided.

Korean: 애견 샴푸와 드라이기 수건 탈취제 공기청정기가 있습니다
English: We have dog shampoo, dryer, towel, deodorizer, and air purifier.
There's more prepared than I thought

Korean: 네 반려견과 이용하시기에 불편함 없도록 준비되어 있습니다
English: Yes, it is prepared so that you can use it with your pet without any inconvenience.
I understand. Thank you for the detailed explanation.

Korean: 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다 반려견과 행복한 시간 되시길 바랍니다
English: This is counselor #@name#. I hope you have a happy time with your dog.
It's a sunny morning. This is the #@affiliation# information center.

Korean: 이번 주에 오션 펫 트윈 룸으로 예약해서 가려고 하는데요
English: I'm planning to make a reservation for the Ocean Pet Twin Room this week.
Yes, which part can I help you with?

Korean: 혹시 호텔에서 강아지 유모차도 대여 가능한가요
English: Is it possible to rent a dog stroller at the hotel?

Korean: 네 저희 호텔에서 반려견 전용 캔넬과 유모차 대여 가능하신데요
English: Yes, our hotel offers rental of dog kennels and strollers.
Then can I apply in advance?
Sorry, rental items are available on a first-come, first-served basis.
You apply when you check in on the same day.

Korean: 네 선착순이라 수량이 부족할 수 있는 점 양해바랍니다
English: Yes, please understand that quantities may be limited as it is first-come, first-served.

Korean: 그럼 유모차는 그냥 가져가야겠네요 안내 감사드려요
English: Then I guess I'll just have to take the stroller. Thank you for the information.
Thank you, counselor #@name#. Have a nice day.
Good morning #@Affiliation# #@Name#

Korean: 안녕하세요 저희가 펫 전용 객실을 예약을 했는데요
English: Hello, we have booked a pet-only room.

Korean: 네 어떤 문의 사항으로 연락 주셨을까요
English: Yes, what is the inquiry you are contacting us for?

Korean: 호텔 내에 반려견을 데리고 다녀도 되나요
English: Can I bring my dog inside the hotel?

Korean: 호텔 내부에서는 유모차나 케이지를 이용해 주시길 바랍니다
English: Please use strollers or cages inside the hotel.
Is it not okay to put a leash on it?

Korean: 네 다른 이용객들도 있으니 양해 바랍니다
English: Yes, please understand that there are other users as well.

Korean: 그럼 케이지말고 강아지용 슬링백에 넣어도 될까요
English: Then, can I put it in a dog sling bag instead of a cage?
Yes, you can use the dog sling bag too
Okay, then take care.

Korean: 앞으로도 더 좋은 서비스를 위해 노력하겠습니다
English: We will continue to strive to provide better service in the future.

Korean: 행복한 하루를 시작하는 #@소속# 안내 센터 입니다
English: This is the #@affiliation# information center to start a happy day.

Korean: 이번에 펫 전용 객실을 예약을 했는데요 궁금한 게 있어서요
English: I recently booked a pet-only room, but I have a question.
Yes, which part can I help you with?
I'm thinking of taking two puppies with me. Is that possible?

Korean: 네 최대 두마리 가능하신데 한마리는 추가 비용을 내셔야 합니다
English: Yes, you can bring up to two, but you will have to pay extra for one.
So how much is the additional cost?
The additional cost for adding one more is 30,000 won.

Korean: 그럼 그만큼 펫 전용 어메니티도 제공 되는 건가   요
English: So, are pet-specific amenities also provided?

Korean: 추가 어메니티는 제공되지 않는 점 양해 바랍니다
English: Please note that additional amenities are not provided.
Okay, I understand. Then, thank you for your hard work.
Thank you, counselor #@name#
The start of a happy day #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#

Korean: 여기 호텔에 강아지 동반 객실이 있다고 들었는데요
English: I heard that this hotel has dog-friendly rooms.

Korean: 네 저희 호텔에 펫 전용 객실이 준비되어있습니다
English: Yes, we have pet-friendly rooms available at our hotel.

Korean: 그럼 강아지들은 종에 상관없이 모두 가능한가요
English: So is it possible for all dogs regardless of breed?

Korean: 특별히 종을 구분하여 받고 있진 않습니다
English: We do not specifically distinguish between species.
Then, is it possible for large dogs too?

Korean: 저희 호텔은 10키로 미만의 반려견 투숙만 가능합니다
English: Our hotel only allows pets under 10kg
I see. My dog is a large dog, so that won't work.

Korean: 아쉽지만 다음 기회에 이용해 주시면 감사하겠습니다
English: It's a pity, but I would appreciate it if you could use it next time.

Korean: 알겠습니다 어쩔 수 없죠 그럼 수고하세요
English: Okay, I can't help it. Well then, thank you for your hard work.

Korean: 앞으로도 더 나은 서비스를 위해 노력하는 #@소속#이 되겠습니다
English: We will continue to strive to provide better service as a #@affiliate#.
I am a #@name# counselor from #@affiliation# who is full of joy.

Korean: 저희가 이주 뒤에 호텔 이용을 할 예정인데요
English: We are planning to use a hotel after we move.
Yes, how may I help you?

Korean: 펫 전용 객실을 예약했는데 궁금한 게 있어서요
English: I booked a pet-friendly room and I have a question.
Yes, which part can I help you with?
I booked breakfast, can I bring my dog too?

Korean: 강아지 전용 유모차나 케이지 사용 시 조식 이용 가능하세요
English: Breakfast is available when using a dog stroller or cage

Korean: 그럼 펫 전용 객실에서 조식 예약 시 강아지 간식도 제공이 되나요
English: So, if I reserve breakfast in a pet-only room, will dog treats also be provided?

Korean: 아니요 별도의 강아지 간식은 제공되지 않습니다
English: No, separate dog treats are not provided.
Okay, I understand. Then, thank you for your hard work.

Korean: 감사합니다 오늘 하루도 행복한 마무리 하시길 바랍니다
English: Thank you. I hope you have a happy day today.

Korean: 행복한 휴식을 선사하는 #@소속# 안내 센터 입니다
English: This is the #@affiliation# information center that provides a happy rest.
I called after seeing the Utopet package.

Korean: 네 저희 호텔 펫 전용 패키지 상품 말씀하시는 걸까요
English: Yes, are you talking about our hotel's pet-only package?

Korean: 맞아요 강아지랑 함께 갈 수 있다고 해서요
English: Yes, because I said I could go with my dog.

Korean: 네 맞습니다 패키지 상품 어떤 안내 도와드리면 될까요
English: Yes, that's right. How can I help you with package information?

Korean: 아 혹시 유토펫 패키지가 언제까지 하는 지 알 수 있을까요
English: Oh, by any chance, do you know how long the Utopet package will last?

Korean: 네 저희 유토펫 패키지는 11월 30일까지 이용 가능하세요
English: Yes, our Utopet package is available until November 30th.
Is the reservation period until November 30th?

Korean: 예약 기간 및 투숙 기간 모두 11월 30일까지 입니다
English: Both the reservation period and the stay period are until November 30th.

Korean: 그렇군요 그럼 빨리 예약해서 이용해 봐야겠네요
English: Okay, then I guess I'll have to make a reservation quickly and use it.

Korean: 감사합니다 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다 반려견과 즐거운 시간 되세요
English: Thank you, counselor #@name#. Have a nice time with your dog.
I am #@Name#, a counselor from #@Affiliation# who is full of joy.

Korean: 지금 호텔에서 하고 있는 펫 전용 패키지 상품 있잖아요
English: There's a pet-only package that the hotel is currently offering.
Yes, can I help you with the Utopet package?

Korean: 네 패키지 구성이 어떻게 되는지 알 수 있을까요
English: Can you tell me what your package consists of?

Korean: 구성은 객실과 조식 뷔페 2인 치킨과 맥주 세트 입니다
English: The package includes a room, a breakfast buffet, and a set of chicken and beer for two.

Korean: 그럼 치킨과 맥주 세트는 당일 저녁에 이용해야 하나요
English: So, do I have to use the chicken and beer set on the same evening?

Korean: 지정된 이용 시간은 없으나 저녁에 치킨과 맥주를 드시고요
English: There is no set time, but you can have chicken and beer in the evening.

Korean: 오전에 조식을 이용하시는 게 좋을 것 같습니다
English: I think it would be better to have breakfast in the morning
Okay, is it possible to bring a dog to breakfast?

Korean: 네 유모차나 케이지 이용 시 조식 레스토랑에 동반 이용 가능하세요
English: Yes, you can bring your baby in a stroller or cage to the breakfast restaurant.

Korean: 좋네요 그럼 남편이랑 상의해 보고 예약해야겠어요
English: Okay, then I'll have to discuss it with my husband and make a reservation.

Korean: 감사합니다 오늘 하루도 행복한 마무리 하시길 바랍니다
English: Thank you. I hope you have a happy day today.
I am a #@name# counselor from #@affiliation# who is full of happiness.
Hello, I'm calling after seeing the Utopet package.

Korean: 네 저희 유토펫 패키지 예약 안내 도와드릴까요
English: Yes, can I help you with your Utopet package reservation?
Before that, I have a question
Yes, please tell me and I will help you.

Korean: 오션 펫 더블 룸이랑 오션 펫 트윈 룸의 차이점이 뭔가요
English: What is the difference between Ocean Pet Double Room and Ocean Pet Twin Room?

Korean: 더블룸은 더블사이즈 침대 하나가 있는 객실이고요
English: A double room is a room with one double-sized bed.

Korean: 트윈룸은 퀸사이즈 침대 하나와 더블사이즈 침대 하나가 있습니다
English: Twin room has one queen size bed and one double size bed.

Korean: 그럼 객실 이용 객 수도 다르겠네요
English: Then the number of guests using the room would be different.

Korean: 네 더블룸은 최대 인원 2명이고 트윈룸은 최대 인원 4명입니다
English: Yes, the double room can accommodate up to 2 people, and the twin room can accommodate up to 4 people.
Okay, thank you for the detailed explanation.

Korean: 다른 문의 사항 있으시면 언제든 연락 바랍니다
English: If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact us at any time.
This is the information center of #@affiliation#, full of happiness.

Korean: 안녕하세요 유토펫 패키지 예약을 하고 싶은데요
English: Hello, I would like to reserve a Utopet package.

Korean: 저희 유토펫 패키지는 반려견 동반 패키지인데 알고 계실까요
English: Did you know that our Utopet package is a pet-friendly package?
Yes, we are three adults and two dogs.
Are there any available rooms?

Korean: 성인 세분에 강아지 두마리면 오션 펫 트윈 룸 추천드립니다
English: If you have two dogs and an adult, we recommend the Ocean Pet Twin Room.
A double room would be too big for three adults.

Korean: 한분은 침구 추가하셔서 바닥에서 주무셔야 할 것 같아서요
English: I think one person will have to sleep on the floor because we added extra bedding.
So does a twin room have two beds?

Korean: 네 퀸사이즈와 더블사이즈라 세분이 주무시기에 충분합니다
English: Yes, it is a queen size and a double size, so it is enough for three people to sleep.

Korean: 그럼 트윈룸으로 예약을 해야겠네요 도움 감사합니다
English: Then I guess I'll have to book a twin room. Thanks for your help.

Korean: 친구분들과 반려견과 즐거운 시간 되세요 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다
English: Have a great time with your friends and your dog. This was counselor #@name#
Hello, I am #@Name#, a friendly counselor from #@Affiliation#.

Korean: 안녕하세요 유토펫 패키지 예약 때문에 전화드렸는데요
English: Hello, I'm calling to reserve a Utopet package.

Korean: 네 저희 유토펫 패키지 어떤 부분 안내 도와드릴까요
English: Yes, which part of our Utopet package can I help you with?

Korean: 오션 펫 더블룸 주중 가격이 어떻게 될까요
English: What is the price for an ocean pet double room during the week?

Korean: 오션 펫 더블룸 주중 가격은 20만원 입니다
English: Ocean Pet Double Room Weekday price is 200,000 won
Is the week from Monday to Friday?
Weekday prices are from Sunday to Thursday.
Then, the weekend price is from Friday to Saturday.
The price on Friday is 300,000 won.
Saturdays and public holidays are 350,000 won.
Okay, I understand. Then, thank you for your hard work.

Korean: 감사합니다 앞으로도 저희 호텔 이용에 많은 관심 부탁드립니다
English: Thank you. We hope you will continue to use our hotel.
I will be happy to help you with your friendly guidance. #@Affiliation#

Korean: 이번에 강아지 동반 패키지 상품이 있다고 들었는데요
English: I heard there is a dog companion package this time.

Korean: 네 저희 호텔에 유토펫 패키지 상품이 있습니다
English: Yes, our hotel has a Utopet package.
So, is there a twin room in the package?

Korean: 네 패키지에 오션 펫 트윈룸이 있습니다
English: Yes, your package includes an ocean pet twin room
So what about the price of a twin room?
What day of the week will you be using it?
I'd like to make a reservation for Friday or Saturday.
Friday is 310,000 won, Saturday is 360,000 won.

Korean: 알겠습니다 날짜 상의 후 다시 연락 드릴게요
English: Okay, I'll get back to you after discussing the date.

Korean: 감사합니다 저는 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다 좋은 하루 되세요
English: Thank you, I am counselor #@name#. Have a nice day.
I'll help you with anything #@Affiliation# #@Name#

Korean: 안녕하세요 저희가 다음 주에 예약해서 이용하려고 하는데요
English: Hello, we would like to make a reservation for next week.
Yes, which part can I help you with?

Korean: 생일자 이벤트 같은 게 있다고 들었는데요
English: I heard there's something like a birthday event

Korean: 투숙 한 당월에 생일이신 분들을 위한 작은 이벤트가 있습니다
English: There is a small event for those whose birthday is in the same month as your stay.
So what is the event about?
We offer two complimentary glasses of red wine.
Do you provide room service?
No, it is served at the 12th floor Primosky Bar

Korean: 마침 와이프 생일이라 가는 건데 잘됐네요
English: It's my wife's birthday so I'm going, so it's a good thing

Korean: 그럼 가족분과 행복한 시간 보내시길 바랍니다
English: Then I hope you have a happy time with your family.
We are #@affiliation# providing the best service.
Hello, I'm calling to see your birthday event.

Korean: 네 저희 원더풀버스데이 안내 도와드리면 될까요
English: Yes, can I help you with our Wonderful Birthday guide?

Korean: 네 저희가 투숙하는 날짜는 아니고 그 다음 주가 생일이라서요
English: Yes, it's not the date we're staying, but next week is my birthday.

Korean: 투숙 하시는 기간의 당월에 속하시면 이벤트 참여 가능하세요
English: If you are staying in the same month, you can participate in the event.

Korean: 다행이네요 투숙하는 그 다음 주가 생일이거든요
English: Thank goodness my birthday is the week after I stay there.

Korean: 네 그럼 체크인 시 신분증으로 생일 확인 부탁드립니다
English: Yes, then please confirm your birthday with your ID when checking in.
Is it okay if I just check my ID?

Korean: 네 신분증에 나와있는 생일 날짜를 확인하면 됩니다
English: You can check your date of birth on your ID card.
Okay, thanks for the kind explanation.

Korean: 저희 호텔에서 행복한 시간 되시길 바랍니다
English: We hope you have a happy time at our hotel.
Hello, I am #@Name#, a friendly counselor from #@Affiliation#.

Korean: 호텔에서 진행하는 생일 이벤트를 보고 전화드렸는데요
English: I called because I saw a birthday event being held at the hotel.

Korean: 네 생일 이벤트 어떤 부분 안내 도와드릴까요
English: What part of your birthday event can I help you with?
Is there a separate event period?
The birthday event runs until December 31, 2021.
You can participate in the event at any time.

Korean: 저희가 생일 이벤트는 주말에만 진행하고 있습니다
English: We only hold birthday events on weekends

Korean: 그럼 평일 이용객은 생일 이벤트를 못 받는 건가요
English: So, does that mean weekday users can't receive birthday events?

Korean: 죄송합니다 주말 고객에 한해 진행 중인 이벤트 입니다
English: Sorry, this event is only available to weekend customers.
Then I guess I'll have to make a reservation for the weekend.

Korean: 앞으로 더 나은 서비스로 만족시키는 #@소속#가 되겠습니다
English: We will become a #@affiliation# that will satisfy you with better service in the future.

Korean: 편안한 휴식을 제공하는 #@소속# 안내 센터 입니다
English: This is the #@affiliation# information center that provides a comfortable rest.

Korean: 안녕하세요 스위트 룸 예약 이벤트를 봤는데요
English: Hello, I saw the sweet room reservation event.
Yes, do you need any guidance?

Korean: 스위트 룸 이용 시 와인 제공한다는데 맞나요
English: Is it true that wine is provided when staying in a suite?

Korean: 네 스위트 룸 투숙 시 와인1병과 치즈를 제공하는 이벤트 입니다
English: This is an event that provides a bottle of wine and cheese when staying in a suite.

Korean: 그럼 스위트 룸 예약하면 알아서 이벤트 참여가 되는 건가요
English: So if I reserve a suite, will I automatically participate in the event?

Korean: 네 유선 상이나 저희 홈페이지에서 예약하시면 됩니다
English: Yes, you can make a reservation online or on our website.
Okay, then I guess I'll have to make a reservation and use it soon.

Korean: 네 좋은 기회에 다양한 서비스를 이용해 보시길 바랍니다
English: Yes, I hope you will take advantage of our various services during this great opportunity.
Okay, thank you for your kind guidance.
Thank you, counselor #@name#. Have a nice day.
Thank you for your inquiry. This is counselor #@name# from #@affiliation#.

Korean: 이번에 진행하는 스위트룸 와인 이벤트 말인데요
English: I'm talking about the Sweet Room Wine event that's being held this time.

Korean: 네 저희 스위트룸 이벤트 안내 도와드릴까요
English: Yes, can I help you with the information about our suite event?

Korean: 지금 전화로 바로 예약을 하면 되는 건가요
English: Can I make a reservation by phone right now?

Korean: 혹시 투숙 하실 날짜가 언제 일까요
English: When is your check-in date?
I'm planning to do it on Saturday, July 24th.
Events are excluded during peak season from July 16 to August 28.
Okay, then I can't participate in the event.
We apologize for any inconvenience.

Korean: 아니에요 호텔 규정이 그렇다니 어쩔 수 없죠
English: No, it can't be helped because it's the hotel's policy.

Korean: 다음에 더 좋은 서비스로 만족드리도록 하겠습니다
English: We will do our best to satisfy you with better service next time.

Korean: 전화 주신 곳은 #@소속# 안내 센터 입니다
English: The place you are calling is #@affiliation# information center

Korean: 네 이번에 와인 제공 이벤트를 보고 전화드렸는데요
English: Yes, I called because I saw the wine event this time.
Can you help me with our event information?

Korean: 이용 객실이 스위트 룸이면 다 되는 건가요
English: Is it okay if the room you are using is a suite?

Korean: 네 저희 호텔의 스위트 룸 이용 시 와인과 치즈 제공이 됩니다
English: Yes, wine and cheese are provided when you stay in a suite at our hotel.

Korean: 혹시 스위트 룸 타입이 몇 개인지 알 수 있을까요
English: Could you tell me how many types of suite rooms there are?
Family Suite, Royal Suite, Diamond Suite, and Emerald Suite

Korean: 4가지 객실 타입 중에 하나로 예약을 해야 한다는 거죠
English: You have to make a reservation for one of the four room types.

Korean: 맞습니다 전화 또는 홈페이지에서 예약하시면 됩니다
English: Yes, you can make a reservation by phone or through our website.

Korean: 네 그럼 날짜 상의해서 다시 연락드릴게요
English: Okay, then I'll discuss the date and contact you again.
Thank you, counselor #@name#
Thank you for your inquiry. This is counselor #@name# from #@affiliation#.
Hello, I'm contacting you about the vacation package.

Korean: 네 저희 호텔 호캉스 패키지 안내 도와드리면 될까요
English: Yes, can I help you with our hotel vacation package?
I'm curious about the package composition. Can you explain it to me?
Yes, you can use the room and have early check-in and late check-out.
We provide two glasses of welcome beer and breakfast for two.

Korean: 객실 타입은 제가 고를 수 있나요
English: Can I choose my room type?

Korean: 패밀리 트윈과 트리플싱글 중에 고르실 수 있습니다
English: You can choose between family twin and triple single.

Korean: 좋네요 그럼 친구들이랑 날짜를 잡아서 예약해야겠네요
English: Okay, then I guess I'll have to make a reservation and set a date with my friends.

Korean: 네 친구분들과 상의해 보시고 다시 연락주세요
English: Please discuss with your friends and get back to me.
Okay, then take care.

Korean: 감사합니다 오늘도 행복한 하루 보내시길 바랍니다
English: Thank you, I hope you have a happy day today.

Korean: 문의 주신 곳은 #@소속#의 안내 센터 입니다
English: The place you are contacting is the information center of #@affiliation#
This time, I booked a vacation package.

Korean: 네 어떤 문의 사항으로 연락 주셨나요
English: Yes, what is the inquiry you are contacting us for?

Korean: 패키지 구성에 조식2인이 있는 걸로 아는데요
English: I understand that the package includes breakfast for two.
Yes, that's right. Breakfast for two is included.

Korean: 혹시 조식을 이용 안하면 다른 서비스로 바꿀 수 있나요
English: If I don't use breakfast, can I change to another service?

Korean: 조식을 이용 안하실 경우 룸서비스로 변경 가능하세요
English: If you do not wish to have breakfast, you may change to room service.
So do I have to tell you about the changes in advance?

Korean: 당일 날 체크인 시 말씀하셔도 됩니다
English: You can tell us when you check in on the day.
Okay, I understand. Thank you for the guidance.
This is counselor #@name#. Have a nice afternoon.
I am a #@name# consultant from #@affiliation# who values customers.

Korean: 이번 주에 호캉스 패키지 예약을 했는데요
English: I booked a vacation package this week.

Korean: 네 어떤 문의 사항으로 연락 주셨을까요
English: Yes, what is the inquiry you are contacting us for?
There are three of us, but breakfast is for two people.
Could you please tell me the room type you reserved?
We booked a triple single room

Korean: 네 트리플싱글룸의 경우 조식도 3인으로 이용 가능하세요
English: Yes, for triple single rooms, breakfast is also available for 3 people.
There is no need to add anything separately.

Korean: 네 별도의 추가 없이 조식 3인 이용 가능하세요
English: Yes, breakfast for 3 people is available without any additional charge.
Thank you. Take care.

Korean: 그럼 저희 호텔에서 행복한 시간 보내시길 바랍니다
English: Then, we hope you have a happy time at our hotel.
This is the #@affiliation# information center for a relaxing afternoon.
I would like to book a vacation package

Korean: 네 저희 호캉스 패키지 예약 도와드리겠습니다
English: Yes, we can help you book your vacation package.
Family Twin Room, Saturday, October 23rd

Korean: 10월23일 토요일은 객실 마감되어 이용이 불가 하세요
English: Saturday, October 23rd is closed and unavailable for use.

Korean: 패밀리 트윈 객실이 다 예약됐다는 건가요
English: Are all the family twin rooms booked?

Korean: 호캉스 패키지 객실이 20개 한정이라 모두 예약 완료 되었습니다
English: The staycation package has a limited number of 20 rooms, so all are fully booked.

Korean: 그럼 10월 중에 패키지 이용 가능한 날짜가 있나요
English: So are there any dates in October where the package is available?
Available on Sunday, October 24th and October 30th and 31st

Korean: 그럼 친구랑 다시 상의해보고 연락 드릴게요
English: Then I'll discuss it with my friend again and get back to you.

Korean: 네 다시 날짜 상의 후 연락 주시길 바랍니다 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다
English: Yes, please contact me again after discussing the date. This was counselor #@name#
This is #@Name#, a counselor from #@Affiliation# who provides happy times.
I would like to book a vacation package

Korean: 네 호캉스 패키지 이용하실 날짜 말씀해 주시겠어요
English: Yes, please tell me the date you will use the vacation package.
The date of use is Saturday, November 13th.

Korean: 죄송합니다 저희 호캉스 패키지 이용 기간은 10월31일까지 입니다
English: Sorry, our vacation package is available until October 31st.

Korean: 아 그래요 연말까지 인 줄 알았는데 10월 말이였군요
English: Oh, right. I thought it was until the end of the year, but it was the end of October.
Yes, we apologize for the inconvenience.
No, I can't confirm that.

Korean: 그럼 날짜 변경을 하셔서 이용하시는 건 어떠실까요
English: Then, how about changing the date and using it?
I don't have time in October, but I'll use it next time.

Korean: 다음 기회에 더 좋은 패키지로 찾아뵙겠습니다
English: We'll come back with a better package next time.
Hello, I am Ramada #@Affiliation# #@Name# counselor.

Korean: 안녕하세요 저희가 여행 계획 중에 #@소속# 패키지를 봤는데요
English: Hello, we saw the #@affiliation# package while we were planning a trip.

Korean: 네 저희 #@소속# 패키지 중 어떤 것을 보셨을까요
English: Hey, which of our #@affiliation# packages have you seen?

Korean: 여수 낭만 요트 이용권 패키지를 봤는데요
English: I saw the Yeosu Romantic Yacht Ticket Package

Korean: #@소속# 예약만 하면 요트 이용권을 주는 거에요
English: #@Affiliation# If you make a reservation, you will be given a yacht ticket.

Korean: 저희 홈페이지나 전화 예약 시 해당 패키지 구매하신다고 하면 됩니다
English: If you make a reservation on our website or by phone, you can purchase the package by saying so.

Korean: 그럼 요트 이용권은 투숙객 수마다 주시는 건가요
English: So, do you give yacht tickets to each guest?

Korean: 객실 당 요트 이용권 2장을 제공하고 있습니다
English: We provide 2 yacht passes per room.

Korean: 그럼 인원 추가 시 나머지 사람들은 따로 구매를 해야 하나요
English: Then, if I add more people, do I have to purchase the rest of them separately?

Korean: 패키지 이용 시 추가 요트 이용권을 할인 된 가격으로 구매하실 수 있습니다
English: When using a package, you can purchase additional yacht tickets at a discounted price.

Korean: 객실 요금에 요트까지 이용할 수 있으니 좋은 상품인 것 같네요
English: It seems like a good deal since you can use the yacht with the room rate.

Korean: 네 여행자분들께서 좋아해주시는 패키지 상품 중 하나 입니다
English: Yes, this is one of the package products that travelers like.

Korean: 그럴 것 같아요 그럼 친구들이랑 상의해보고 다시 연락드릴게요
English: I think so. I'll talk it over with my friends and get back to you.

Korean: 감사합니다 친구분들과 즐거운 여행 되시길 바랍니다
English: Thank you and I hope you have a nice trip with your friends.

Korean: 즐거운 여행의 휴식을 제공하는 #@소속# 안내 센터 입니다
English: This is the #@affiliation# information center that provides a relaxing break during your pleasant trip.
I'm going on a trip to Yeosu with my girlfriend.
Yes, which part can I help you with?

Korean: 혹시 조금 더 저렴한 가격으로 예약할 수 있는 방법이 있을까요
English: Is there any way I can book at a slightly cheaper price?

Korean: 저렴하게 이용하시는 방법 중에 레이트버드 특가가 있는데요
English: Among the ways to use it cheaply, there is a Latebird special price.
What is the Latebird special price?

Korean: 체크인 시간을 늦게 하시는 경우 20프로 정도 할인해 드리고 있습니다
English: If you check in late, we offer a 20% discount.

Korean: 원래 체크인 시간과 레이트버드인 경우 얼마나 차이 나나요
English: How much difference is there between the original check-in time and the late check-in time?

Korean: 정상 체크인 시간은 15시이고요 레이트버드의 경우 18시 입니다
English: Regular check-in time is 3pm and late check-in time is 6pm

Korean: 좋네요 어차피 여행하고 저녁 먹고 들어갈 예정이었거든요
English: That's good. I was planning to go on a trip and have dinner anyway.
Yes, then may I help you with the reservation?

Korean: 우선 여자친구랑 상의를 해보고 다시 연락드릴게요
English: I'll talk it over with my girlfriend first and then get back to you.

Korean: 알겠습니다 저는 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다 좋은 하루 되십시오
English: Okay, I'm counselor #@name#. Have a nice day.
Nice to meet you, I'm #@Affiliation# #@Name#
Hello, I heard that there is a birthday benefit at #@affiliation#

Korean: 혹시 예약을 이미 하신 분이신가요 아니면 예약 예정이실까요
English: Have you already made a reservation or are you planning to make one?

Korean: 다음 주 토요일 날로 이미 예약한 상태에요
English: I already have a reservation for next Saturday.

Korean: 네 그러시면 생일 이벤트 신청 도와드릴텐데요
English: Yes, then I will help you apply for the birthday event.

Korean: 아 따로 신청을 해야 하는 건가요
English: Oh, do I need to apply separately?

Korean: 예약자분 성함과 예약 날짜만 확인하면 됩니다
English: Just check the name of the person making the reservation and the reservation date.

Korean: 그럼 예약자분 성함과 이용 날짜 말씀해 주시겠어요
English: Then, please tell me the name of the person making the reservation and the date of use.
My name is #@name# and the date is October 16th.

Korean: 네 확인 감사합니다 이벤트 참여 완료 되셨고요
English: Yes, thank you for checking. You have completed your participation in the event.

Korean: 체크인 시 신분증으로 생년월일 확인 받으시면 됩니다
English: You can verify your date of birth by showing your ID upon check-in.
Oh, I see. Thank you for the guidance.

Korean: 감사합니다 저희 #@소속#에서 뜻깊은 생일 보내시길 바랍니다
English: Thank you, we hope you have a meaningful birthday at our #@affiliation#
Hello, this is counselor #@Affiliation#, #@Name#

Korean: 안녕하세요 생일자 이벤트 때문에 문의가 있어서요
English: Hello, I have a question about the birthday event.
Yes, what is the reason you are calling?

Korean: 제가 10월 생일이면 10월 중으로 이용하기만 하면 되나요
English: If my birthday is in October, can I just use it within October?

Korean: 네 맞습니다 투숙 하시는 당 월 생일자 혜택이 가능합니다
English: Yes, that's right. You can get the benefit for your birthday in the month you stay.
So how long does the birthday event last?
The birthday event runs until December 31st.

Korean: 그럼 혹시 내년에도 생일 이벤트가 있을까요
English: Then, will there be a birthday event next year too?

Korean: 내년 이벤트 계획의 경우 아직 알 수 없어 안내가 불가 합니다
English: We are unable to provide information on next year's event plans as they are not yet known.

Korean: 그렇군요 그럼 연말에 부모님 모시고 여행 겸 이용해 봐야겠네요
English: Okay, then I guess I'll have to take my parents on a trip at the end of the year.

Korean: 감사합니다 앞으로도 #@소속# 이용에 많은 관심 부탁드립니다
English: Thank you. We hope you will continue to show a lot of interest in using #@affiliation#.
Hello, this is the #@affiliation# information center.
Hello#@Affiliation# I'm calling you after seeing the birthday event.
Yes, which part can I help you with?
We are planning to go on a trip in November.

Korean: 11월 생일자가 있으면 혜택을 받을 수 있는 거 맞죠
English: If you have a birthday in November, you can get the benefit, right?

Korean: 네 투숙 기간 내 해당 월 생일자가 있으면 가능합니다
English: Yes, if there is a person whose birthday falls in that month during your stay, it is possible.
So what are the benefits?

Korean: 예약 하신 객실에서 한 단계 업그레이드 되세요
English: Upgrade your room to a higher level
Room upgrade is a birthday benefit
And late check-out is available.
Oh, the room upgrade and late checkout benefits.

Korean: 네 맞습니다 그럼 또 다른 문의 사항 있으신가요
English: Yes, that's right. Do you have any other questions?
No, first of all, I understand. Then, thank you for your hard work.
Thank you for calling #@Affiliation# This is counselor #@Name#
Hello, I would like to inquire about transportation.
Yes sir, how may I help you?

Korean: 청주박물관 가려고 하는데 어떻게 가야되는지 문의 드릴려구요
English: I'm planning to go to the Cheongju Museum, so I'd like to ask how to get there.
Yes, where are you starting from?
I'm planning to depart from Jincheon Bus Terminal. Could you please give me some directions?
Yes, first, take bus number 711 from Jincheon Terminal.

Korean: 상당공원에서 하차하시고 4분 거리에 지하상가 정류장으로 이동하시구요
English: Get off at Sangdang Park and walk 4 minutes to the underground shopping mall stop.
Yes, get off at Sangdang Park and go to the underground shopping mall bus stop.

Korean: 네 그리고 863번 버스 탑승하시고 국립청주박물관에서 하차하시면 돼요
English: Yes, and take bus number 863 and get off at the National Cheongju Museum.
Okay, how long will it take?
It takes about 1 hour and 30 minutes to walk there.

Korean: 네 알겠습니다 알려주신 버스타고 다녀올게요 수고하세요
English: Yes, I understand. I will take the bus you told me to go. Thank you for your hard work.

Korean: 네 추운 겨울 감기 조심하세요 #@소속# 상담사 #@이름#이었습니다
English: Yes, be careful not to catch a cold in this cold winter. #@Affiliation# This was counselor #@Name#
Thank you for calling #@Affiliation# This is counselor #@Name#

Korean: 안녕하세요 제가 미타사 템플스테이 예약을 했는데요
English: Hello, I made a reservation for the Mita Temple Stay.
How do I get there by public transportation?
Where are you departing from?
I'm planning to leave from Chungju. Please tell me how to get there.

Korean: 네 그러시면 충주버스터미널에서 음성행 버스를 탑승하시구요
English: Yes, then take the bus to Eumseong from Chungju Bus Terminal.

Korean: 비산리에서 하차하셔서 미타사까지 도보로 이동하셔야 해요
English: You have to get off at Bisan-ri and walk to Mitasa Temple.
Yeah, how long does the bus take?
It takes about 30 minutes.

Korean: 비산리에서 정차하지 않는 버스가 있는데 꼭 확인하셔야 합니다
English: There are buses that don't stop at Bisan-ri, so you should definitely check
Oh, yes, I will take note of that. Thank you for your advice.
Yes, do you have any further questions?
No, no, thank you for your hard work.
This was counselor #@name#
Thank you for calling #@Affiliation# This is counselor #@Name#

Korean: 안녕하세요 제가 서울에서 음성 미타사를 가려고 하는데요
English: Hello, I am planning to go to Mitasa Temple in Seoul.
Please tell me how to get there by public transportation.
You need to take a bus from Dong Seoul Terminal or Nambu Terminal.
You can take the bus to the public bus terminal.
Oh, yes, it's the public bus terminal.

Korean: 네 음성버스터미널에서 하차하셔서 충주행 버스를 탑승하시구요
English: Yes, get off at the voice bus terminal and take the bus to Chungju.
You must get off at Bisan-ri and walk.
Yes, you are telling me to transfer to the bus to Chungju.
Yes, that's right, sir.
How long does it take on a voice terminal?
It will take about 10 minutes.
Okay, it won't take that long.
Yes, thank you #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#
Thank you for calling #@Affiliation# This is counselor #@Name#

Korean: 안녕하세요 버스로 미타사 가는 방법 문의드려도 되나요
English: Hello, can I ask you how to get to Mitasa by bus?
Yes, please feel free to speak.

Korean: 청주시외버스터미널에서 음성버스터미널 가는 버스 요금은 얼마인가요
English: How much is the bus fare from Cheongju Intercity Bus Terminal to Eumseong Bus Terminal?
The bus fare is 5900 won, customer.
Yeah, what is the bus interval?
It operates at an average interval of 40 minutes and runs 21 times until 9 p.m.
If you want to go to Mitasa from the Eumseong Bus Terminal, you have to transfer to a bus.
Yes, you need to take the bus to Chungju.
You must get off at Bisan-ri and walk.

Korean: 아 네 알겠습니다 시간이 좀 걸리겠네요 상담 감사합니다
English: Oh, yes, I understand. It will take some time. Thank you for your advice.
Yes, thank you #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#
Nice to meet you, I am #@Affiliation#, counselor #@Name#

Korean: 예 수고하십니다 교통편 관련해서 문의 드릴려구요
English: Yes, thank you for your hard work. I would like to inquire about transportation.
Yes, how may I help you, sir?

Korean: 상수허브랜드를 가려고 하는데 청주역에서 어떻게 가요
English: I'm trying to go to Sangsu Herb Brand, how do I get there from Cheongju Station?
Yes, sir, you need to take the bus.

Korean: 청주역에서 711번 버스를 탑승하셔서 상당공원에서 하차를 하시구요
English: Take bus number 711 from Cheongju Station and get off at Sangdang Park.
From there, take bus number 407 and get off at Buyong-oecheon 2-ri.
Oh, I have to change buses once.
Yes, sir, you should take 711 and transfer to 407.
How long will it take then?
Yes, the bus ride takes about 1 hour and 10 minutes.
Yes, I understand. Thank you for the detailed explanation.
Yes, thank you #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#
Nice to meet you, I am #@Affiliation#, counselor #@Name#

Korean: 네 그 교통편에 대해 문의드리고 싶은데요
English: Yes, I would like to inquire about that transportation.
Yes, what are you curious about?

Korean: 상수허브랜드에서 청주고속버스터미널 가려면 몇 번 버스를 타야 돼요
English: Which bus should I take to get from Sangsu Herb Brand to Cheongju Express Bus Terminal?

Korean: 네 버스를 한번 환승을 하셔야 되구요
English: Yes, you have to transfer buses once.
Take bus number 413 from Buyong-oecheon-ri bus stop and get off at E-Mart.
Take bus number 50 from E-Mart and get off at the intercity bus terminal.
Yes, take bus 413 and transfer to bus 50.
Yes, you can do that
Oh yes, thank you for the detailed explanation.
Do you have any further questions?
No, there isn't. Thank you for your hard work.
Yes, thank you #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#
Nice to meet you, I am #@Affiliation#, counselor #@Name#

Korean: 안녕하세요 음성으로 여행을 가기로 했는데 문의 좀 드릴려구요
English: Hello, I decided to go on a trip by voice, so I would like to ask you some questions.
Yes sir, how may I help you?
I would like to rent a car from #@affiliation#

Korean: 가격이 어떻게 되는지 알 수 있나요
English: Can you tell me how much it costs?
Yes, sir, I can confirm it as 80,000 won.

Korean: 자세한 내용은 렌트카 업체로 문의주셔야 할 것 같아요
English: I think you should contact the rental car company for more details.

Korean: 아 그래요 전화번호 알려주실 수 있나요
English: Oh, okay, can you tell me your phone number?
I'll call your number.
Just a moment, please call me now.
Your phone number is #@phone#
Yes, I will call #@phone number# and ask. Thank you.
Yes, thank you #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#
Nice to meet you, I am #@Affiliation#, counselor #@Name#
Hello, I'm contacting you because I have something to ask.
Yes, sir, what is the content?

Korean: 청주로 여행 가는데 렌트카 비용을 알고 싶어서요
English: I'm traveling to Cheongju and would like to know the cost of a rental car.
Please tell me what type of car you would like to rent
Yes, I'm thinking about a light car.
It varies by car type, but for a compact car it's 30,000 won.

Korean: 금액은 차종과 연식에 따라 변경이 될 수 있습니다
English: The amount may vary depending on the vehicle model and year.
Okay, where can I make a reservation?
You can make a reservation by calling the company.

Korean: 예약하실 때 금액이 변경되는지도 문의해 주시면 되세요
English: Please inquire about changes to the price when making a reservation.

Korean: 네 알겠습니다 조금 생각해보고 예약할게요 수고하세요
English: Okay, I understand. I'll think about it and make a reservation. Thank you.
Yes, thank you #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#
I will always be kind to you. #@Affiliation# #@Name#
Hello, this is Namdaecheon.
#@Affiliation#What is the fastest way to get to the beach?

Korean: 네 고객님 혹시 이동수단이 대중교통이신가요 자동차이신가요
English: Yes, sir, do you use public transportation or a car?

Korean: 둘 다 알려줘보실래요 빠른 길을 확인해 보고 싶어서요
English: Could you tell me both? I want to check the quickest route.
Yes, for public transportation, take bus number 12 from Nammun.
#@Affiliation# It takes about 1 hour and 3 minutes to get off at the beach.
Wow, it takes a long time. What about the car?
It takes about 18 minutes by car.

Korean: 아무래도 훨씬 빠르군요 안내해주신 경로가 가장 빠른 길이죠
English: It seems to be much faster. The route you gave me is the fastest.

Korean: 네 맞으세요 가장 빠른 길로 안내드렸습니다
English: Yes, that's right. I guided you to the fastest route.
Yes, I understand. Thank you for your guidance.

Korean: 네 고객님 양양에서 즐거운 시간 보내시구요 저는 #@이름#이었습니다
English: Yes, dear customer, have a nice time in Yangyang. I am #@name#
Thank you for calling #@Affiliation# This is counselor #@Name#
Yes, hello. I'm planning to go to the ecological park from Haman Bus Terminal.

Korean: 버스 타고 가려고 하는데 몇 번 버스를 타면 될까요
English: I'm planning to take the bus. Which bus number should I take?

Korean: 네 고객님 터미널에서 생태공원까지 가는 농어촌 버스를 이용하시면 되세요
English: Yes, you can take the rural bus from the terminal to the eco park.

Korean: 혹시 여기서 생태공원까지 가는 셔틀버스는 없는건가요
English: Is there a shuttle bus from here to the eco park?

Korean: 네 고객님 생태공원까지 운행되는 셔틀버스는 따로 없으세요
English: Yes, sir, there is no separate shuttle bus that runs to the eco park.

Korean: 그래도 농어촌 버스 노선이 다양해서 가시는데 불편함은 없으실거에요
English: However, there are various rural bus routes, so you won't have any inconvenience in getting there.
How long does it take by bus?
It takes about an hour.

Korean: 아 그렇군요 네 잘 알겠습니다 안내 감사해요
English: Oh, I see. Yes, I understand. Thank you for the guidance.

Korean: 네 고객님 함안에서 즐거운 추억 만드시기 바랍니다
English: Yes, I hope you make happy memories in Haman.
I will do my best #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#

Korean: 네 안녕하세요 함안에 있는 #@소속# 가는 차편해서 문의하려고요
English: Yes, hello. I'm going to #@affiliation# in Haman, so I'd like to inquire about transportation.
Yes, how may I help you, sir?
I see, it's not a bus

Korean: #@소속#을 갈 수 있는 기차 편이 있는 것 같던데 맞나요
English: I think there is a train that can take you to #@affiliation#, is that correct?

Korean: 네 맞으세요 고객님 서울역에서 KTX를 타시고 동대구역으로 가신 후에요
English: Yes, that's right. Customer, take the KTX from Seoul Station to Dongdaegu Station.
You can transfer to the Mugunghwa train and get off at Haman Station.

Korean: 함안역에서 내리면 입곡군립공원을 바로 갈 수 있나요
English: If I get off at Haman Station, can I go straight to Ipgok County Park?

Korean: 함안역에서 입곡군립공원까지 가는 셔틀버스가 운행되고 있습니다
English: A shuttle bus runs from Haman Station to Ipgok County Park.

Korean: 아 셔틀버스가 있군요 시간은 얼마나 걸릴까요
English: Oh, there's a shuttle bus. How long will it take?
You can arrive at Ipgok County Park in about 8 minutes by shuttle bus.

Korean: 오 금방이네요 네 알겠습니다 안내 감사드려요
English: Oh, it'll be soon. Yes, I understand. Thank you for the information.

Korean: 네 조심해서 오시구요 즐거운 여행 되시기 바라겠습니다
English: Yes, please take care and I hope you have a pleasant trip.
I will do my best #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#
Hello, I need to go to Jonamsan from Haman Station.

Korean: 버스를 타고 가야하는데 이 시간에 버스가 다니고 있나요
English: I need to take the bus, but is there a bus running at this time?

Korean: 아 네 고객님 버스 운행 확인해 드릴게요
English: Oh, yes, customer. I will check the bus operation.

Korean: 현재 농어촌 주동에서 함안으로 가는 버스가 운행되고 있습니다
English: Currently, there is a bus running from Nong-eo-chon Ju-dong to Haman.

Korean: 아 그래요 혹시 막차는 몇 시 일까요
English: Oh, by the way, what time is the last train?
The last train time is confirmed to be 8:30 PM.

Korean: 아 그럼 혹시 지금시간에는 막차만 이용할 수 있는건가요
English: Oh, so is it possible to only take the last train at this time?
Yes, the vehicle departed a little while ago at 7:20.
The next available train is the last train at 8:30.

Korean: 그렇군요 그래도 막차 안놓쳐서 다행이네요 안내 감사합니다
English: I see. Still, I'm glad I didn't miss the last train. Thank you for the information.

Korean: 네 남은 하루도 마무리 잘하시구요 저는 상담원 #@이름#이었습니다
English: Yes, I hope you finish the rest of your day well. I was your counselor #@name#.
I will be happy to serve you. #@Affiliation#, counselor #@Name#

Korean: 네 안녕하세요 이번에 단체로 함안에 가려고 하는데요
English: Yes, hello. I'm planning to go to Haman with a group this time.

Korean: 함안에서 제일 괜찮은 버스대절 업체에다 버스대절 하고 싶어서요

Korean: 네 고객님 출발 날짜와 단체인원이 확인해 주시겠습니까

It's December 18th and there are 20 people, but one or two people can be adjusted.

Korean: 네 고객님 함안버스대절 이란 업체가 가장 오래되고 유명한데요
English: Yes, sir, Haman Bus Charter is the oldest and most famous company.

Korean: 12월18일날 20명 내외 탑승 가능한 버스 대절이 가능하실 것 같습니다
English: It seems like it would be possible to charter a bus for about 20 people on December 18th.

Korean: 그래요 그럼 대절 비용도 알 수 있나요

The rental fee is 350,000 won for 20 people.

Korean: 자세한건 업체로 문의해 보시는게 더 정확하실 것 같습니다
English: I think it would be more accurate to contact the company for more details.

Korean: 네 알겠습니다 업체 전화번호 알려주시면 전화해볼게요
English: Okay, I understand. If you tell me the company's phone number, I'll call you.
Yes, this is Ham An Bus Terminal #@Phone Number#
Yes, thank you. Thank you for your hard work.

Korean: 네 고객님 또 다른 문의사항 있으시면 언제든 전화주세요
English: Yes sir, if you have any further questions, please call me anytime.
Hello, this is #@Affiliation# counselor #@Name#. How may I help you?

Korean: 함안버스터미널에서 강주해바라기마을로 버스타고 갈 수 있죠
English: You can take a bus from Haman Bus Terminal to Gangju Sunflower Village.

Korean: 네 버스타고 가실 수 있고요 113다시1번 버스를 타시면 됩니다

Korean: 혹시 경로가 어떻게 되는지도 알 수 있을까요
English: Could you please tell me what the route is?

So how long does it take in total?
It takes about 41 minutes by bus.
Oh, I see. Yes, I understand.

Korean: 네 고객님 조심해서 오시구요 오늘도 즐거운 하루 보내세요
English: Yes, dear customer, please be careful and have a nice day today.
I will take good care of you. #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#

Korean: 안녕하세요 이번에 함안 여행할거라 문의 전화드린 건데요
English: Hello, I'm calling to inquire about my upcoming trip to Haman.

English: There are all kinds of dishes that can be made with dumplings. How much does it cost?
Dumplings cost about 6,500 won per person.
Okay, thank you for your kind guidance.
Have a nice trip, this was Counselor #@Name#
Hello, I am #@Affiliation#Tourism's friendly consultant #@Name#

Yes, please send it to #@account#

English: Then, you can ride for less than 120 meters with a guardian.

English: Yes, you can ride if you are accompanied by a guardian.

Korean: 아이 데리고 루지에 탑승 가능 한가요

English: Those over 71 years of age with spinal problems are restricted from boarding

Yes, pregnant women are not allowed to board either.

English: MTBs are not allowed as they cause damage to the Jirisan Trail.

Korean: 그러면 휄체어나 유모차도 이용할 수 없겠네요
English: Then I guess I won't be able to use a wheelchair or a stroller.

Korean: 네 고도 변화가 심하고 폭이 좁은 구간이 많아서 통행이 어렵습니다
English: Yes, there are many narrow sections with significant elevation changes, making it difficult to pass.
Yes, thank you for checking.

Yes, first of all, the starting point of the 1st course is #@affiliation#

Korean: 그러면 길 폭이 넓고 여럿이 함께 걷기에 좋겠네요
English: Then the road will be wide and it will be good for many people to walk together.

Korean: 예 평지길이고 주변에는 황산대첩비지 송흥록 생가도 있습니다

I'm so good at walking around the perimeter

English: I would like to ask which course is more difficult among courses 1, 2, and 3.

Korean: 그러시면 저희 인월 금계 구간인 3코스를 추천드립니다

Korean: 거리가 대략 19킬로미터 정도고 보통 8시간을 잡고 출발하세요

Korean: 예상 시간이 8시간이면 저한테 딱 맞는 코스일 거 같네요
English: If the estimated time is 8 hours, it seems like a perfect course for me.

Okay, I understand. Thank you for your hard work.

English: I'm planning to challenge myself to complete the Saejae Pass and Sojo Ridge Trail.

Korean: 하루 코스이긴 하지만 산행 난이도가 있다고 들어서요
English: I heard that although it is a one-day course, it is a difficult hike.

Korean: 네 장고개 올라가는 구간이 제일 어려우실 거예요
English: Yes, the section going up Janggogae will be the most difficult.

Korean: 코스 중간에 전망을 바라보며 쉴 수 있는 곳이 어디인가요
English: Where can I rest and enjoy the view in the middle of the course?

Korean: 네 일단 장고개 정상이 장고개 전망 포인트고요
English: Yes, first of all, the top of Janggogae is the Janggogae observation point.

Korean: 코스 중간에 마당바위 쉼터도 추천드리는 전망 포인트입니다
English: The Madangbawi Shelter in the middle of the course is also a recommended observation point.

Korean: 쉴 수 있는 곳이 두 군데면 충분할 거 같네요
English: I think two places to rest would be enough.

Korean: 네 혹시 더 궁금하신 점 있으실까요

No, thank you. Thank you for your hard work.

English: We recommend wearing long sleeves to avoid getting bitten by bugs.

Korean: 그렇군요 서바이벌이 더 비싸던데 더 많이 쏴 보겠네요
English: I see, survival is more expensive, so I'll try shooting more.

English: Oh good. Then I'll try to reserve that later.
Yes, thank you, it was counselor #@name#

Korean: 안녕하세요 천혜의 자연이 숨 쉬는 담양 #@소속#입니다

Korean: 네 가마골 코스 어떻게 안내 도와드릴까요

Korean: 아 그렇군요 그쪽은 산세가 험하진 않은가 봐요

English: I didn't know it was a railway facility. So the trains run there?

Korean: 네 고객님 두가지 타입의 열차가 운행중에 있고요
English: Yes sir, there are two types of trains in operation.

Korean: 수려한 해안 절경을 감상하시는 관광 코스입니다
English: This is a tourist course where you can enjoy the beautiful coastal scenery.

Korean: 바다를 보며 기차를 탄다니 여쭤보길 잘했단 생각이들어요
English: I think it was a good idea to ask about taking the train while looking at the sea.

Korean: 다른 사항 더 궁금하신 부분 있을까요
English: Is there anything else you would like to know?

Korean: 아뇨 충분해요 일단 여행코스에 무조건 넣을게요 감사합니다
English: No, that's enough. I'll definitely add it to my travel itinerary. Thank you.

Korean: 언제든 여행관련 문의주시고요 즐거운 추억 만드는 시간 되세요
English: Please feel free to contact us anytime regarding your travel and we hope you have a wonderful time creating memories.
#@Affiliation# Thank you
Thank you #@Affiliation# Counselor #@Name#

Korean: 안녕하세요 여행 계획하는데 궁금한 게 있어 전화드려요
English: Hello, I'm calling because I have some questions about planning a trip.
Yes, sir, what are you curious about?

Korean: 인터넷에서 해안을 따라 기차를 타는 사진을 봤는데요
English: I saw a picture on the internet of a train ride along the coast.

Korean: 부산인 것 같아서요 혹시 알고 계실까요
English: I think it's Busan. Do you happen to know?

Korean: 네 고객님 설명만으로는 아마도 해운대 블루라인파크 같아요
English: Yes, based on your description, it's probably Haeundae Blue Line Park.

Korean: 해운대 블루라인파크에 대해 알려주실 수 있나요
English: Can you tell me about Haeundae Blue Line Park?

Korean: 해운대 미포 청사포 송정에 이르는 철도 시설이에요
English: This is a railway facility that connects Haeundae, Mipo, Cheongsapo, and Songjeong.

Korean: 철도 시설이었군요 그럼 어떻게 이용하는 거에요
English: It's a railway facility, so how do you use it?

Korean: 앞서 말한 세 정거장 중 편하신 정거장에서 탑승하시면 되세요
English: You can board at any of the three stops mentioned above.

Korean: 혹시 자세히 볼 수 있는 웹사이트도 있나요
English: Is there a website where I can see more details?

Korean: 네 고객님 #@소속# 사이트에 보시면 연결링크 제공되고 있습니다
English: Yes, dear customer, if you look at the #@affiliation# site, a link is provided.

Korean: 일단 어딘지 찾았으니 한 번 둘러볼게요 감사합니다
English: Now that I've found the place, I'll take a look around. Thank you.

Korean: 네 언제든 해운대 방문하실 때 찾아주세요 감사합니다
English: Yes, please come visit us whenever you visit Haeundae. Thank you.
